S04bsu016_u:4391: na caiṣāṃ śarīre vyādhirutpadyate dhātusaṃkṣobhajo vā aparaparikramiko vā /

S04bsu016_u:4394: sarve ca te sattvā anyonyaṃ maitracittā bhavanti harṣaprītisaṃjātāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:4395: teṣāmahaṃ kulaputra harṣaprītisaṃjātānāmāśayaviśuddhimārabhya tathā dharmaṃ deśayāmi,
S04bsu016_u:4397: asti kulaputra malayaparvatasaṃbhavaṃ gośīrṣaṃ nāma candanam,
S04bsu016_u:4399: asti kulaputra sāgarakacchasaṃbhavo aparājito nāma gandhaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:4400: yenānuliptāyā bheryāḥ śaṅkhasya vā nirghoṣeṇa sarvaparacakraṃ parājayaṃ gacchati /
S04bsu016_u:4401: asti kulaputra anavataptahṛdatīrasaṃbhavaṃ padmagarbhaṃ nāma kālāgaru,
S04bsu016_u:4402: yasya tilamātrā gulikā sakalaṃ jambudvīpaṃ gandhena spharati /
S04bsu016_u:4405: asti kulaputra himavatparvatarājasaṃbhavā aruṇavatī nāma gandhajātiḥ,
S04bsu016_u:4409: asti kulaputra rākṣasalokasaṃbhavā sāgaragarbhā nāma gandhajātiḥ,
S04bsu016_u:4411: yayā dhūpitamātrayā caturaṅgo balakāyo rājñaścakravartino gaganatale pratiṣṭhate /
S04bsu016_u:4417: teṣāmupasaṃkrāntānāṃ suyāmo devarājo dhārmīṃ kathāṃ kathayati /
S04bsu016_u:4418: asti kulaputra tuṣitabhavane sindhuvāritā nāma gandhajātiḥ,
S04bsu016_u:4419_0: yā dharmāsananiṣaṇṇasya ekajātipratibaddhasya bodhisattvasya purato dhūpitā mahāgandhameghena
S04bsu016_u:4420: asti kulaputra sunirmitadevarājabhavane manoharā nāma gandhajātiḥ,
S04bsu016_u:4423_0: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ nirāmagandhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sarvakāmoccalitānāṃ kleśamārapāśavipramuktānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:4423_2: sarvālayaniketāniśritānāṃ sarvabhavālayaniketacāriṇāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum,
S04bsu016_u:4431: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:4433_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidāraka utpalabhūtergāndhikaśreṣṭhinaḥ pādau śirasābhivandya
S04bsu016_u:4436: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ kūṭāgāranagarābhimukhaṃ mārgaṃ pratipadyamāno 'nuvicaran,
S04bsu016_u:4437_0: mārganimnatāṃ mārgonnatatāṃ mārgasamatāṃ mārgaviṣamatāṃ mārgasarajaskatāṃ mārgavirajaskatāṃ
S04bsu016_u:4437_2: evaṃ cittamutpādayāmāsa - idaṃ khalu me tasya kalyāṇamitrasyopasaṃkramaṇaṃ bodhisattvamārgapratipattihetubhūtaṃ
S04bsu016_u:4446_0: sa evaṃ cintāmanasikāraprayukto durāsadasamudācāro 'nupūrveṇa yena kūṭāgāraṃ nagaraṃ
S04bsu016_u:4446_1: tenopasaṃkramya vairaṃ dāśaṃ parimārgan parigaveṣamāṇo 'drākṣīnmahānagaramukhe sāgarāvatāratīre
S04bsu016_u:4446_2: vairaṃ dāśaṃ vaṇikūśatasahasrairanekaiśca prāṇiśatasahasrairvicitrāṃ kathāṃ śrotukāmaiḥ
S04bsu016_u:4449_0: upetya vairasya dāśasya pādau śirasābhivandya vairaṃ dāśamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ
S04bsu016_u:4449_1: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya vairasya dāśasya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāhamayā ārya anuttarāyāṃ
S04bsu016_u:4450: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:4452: śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
S04bsu016_u:4453: tadvadatu me āryaḥ - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:4459: mahāsāgaratīrakūṭāgāre mahānagare prativasāmi mahākaruṇādhvajāṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ pariśodhayan /
S04bsu016_u:4460: so 'haṃ kulaputra jambudvīpe daridrān sattvānavalokya eṣāmarthāya tathā tapastapyāmi,
S04bsu016_u:4476: evaṃ cintāmanasikāraprayukto 'haṃ kulaputra iha sāgaratīrakūṭāgāranagare pravicarāmi /
S04bsu016_u:4482_1: mārutasaṃgrahaṇaṃ mārutotpādanaṃ yānāvartanaṃ yānaparivartanaṃ yānasaṃsthāpanaṃ yānasaṃpreṣaṇaṃ prajānāmi /
S04bsu016_u:4483_0: so 'haṃ kulaputra evaṃjñānasamanvāgataḥ satataṃ sattvārthakāryaprayukto vaṇiggaṇaṃ
S04bsu016_u:4483_1: dṛḍhena yānena kṣemeṇa śivenābhayena yathāpraharṣaṃ pramodayan dhārmyā kathayā yathābhiprāyeṇa
S04bsu016_u:4485: na ca mama kulaputra kadācit kiṃcid yānapātraṃ vipannapūrvam /
S04bsu016_u:4487: ye ca sattvā mama dharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇvanti,
S04bsu016_u:4499: etasya ahaṃ kulaputra mahākarūṇādhvajasya amoghadarśanaśravaṇaṃ saṃvāsānusmṛtirnāma nadīnirghoṣasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya lābhī /
S04bsu016_u:4500_0: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sarvasaṃsārasāgaravicāriṇāṃ sarvakleśāsāgarānupaliptānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:4504: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:4506_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako vairasya dāśasya pādau śirasābhivandya vairaṃ dāśamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ
S04bsu016_u:4506_1: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya aśrumukho rudan kalyāṇamitradarśanābhilāṣāvitṛpto
S04bsu016_u:4509_6: yena nandihāraṃ nagaraṃ tenopasaṃkramya jayottamaṃ śreṣṭhinaṃ parimārgan parigaveṣamāṇo
S04bsu016_u:4509_8: vividhāni nagarakāryāṇi pariniṣṭhāpayantaṃ tadāgamya ca dhārmīṃ kathāṃ kathayantam,
S04bsu016_u:4525: bodhisattvaprajñābalasaṃdarśanatayā bodhisattvasmṛtibalaviśuddhyuttāraṇatāyai dharmaṃ deśayamānaṃ yaduta bodhicittotpādābhirocanāya //
S04bsu016_u:4526_1: pādayoḥ praṇipatya suciramabhināmya dharmagauravapratilabdhenāśayena evaṃ vācamudīrayāmāsasudhano 'smi,
S04bsu016_u:4529: tadvadatu me āryo yathāhaṃ bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣeyam /
S04bsu016_u:4540: atha khalu jayottamaḥ śreṣṭhī sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamevamāha - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
S04bsu016_u:4544: sarvamārabhavaneṣu sarvakāmādhātuṣu devanikāyāntargateṣu sarvadevabhavaneṣu sarvanāgalokeṣu sarvanāgabhavaneṣu,
S04bsu016_u:4568: adattādānāt kāmamithyācārāt mṛṣāvādāt paiśunyāt pārūṣyāt saṃbhinnapralāpādabhidhyāyā vyāpādāt mithyādṛṣṭeḥ sattvānnivārayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:4578: sarvabuddhadharmārocanatāyai yāvadbrahmaloke 'pi sarvarūpadhātukān devānabhibhūya dharmaṃ deśayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:4580: tathā daśasu dikṣu daśānabhilāpyabuddhakṣetrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu lokadhātuṣu dharmaṃ deśayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:4600: sarvatathāgatādvayākalpācintyaśarīraparamāṇāṃ sarvatryadhvānusṛtajñānakāyānāṃ gaganatalavipulāpramāṇagocaraviṣayāṇāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum //
S04bsu016_u:4602: ihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe śroṇāparānteṣu janapadeṣu kaliṅgavanaṃ nāma nagaram /

S04bsu016_u:4606_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako jayottamasya śreṣṭhinaḥ pādau śirasābhivandya jayottamaṃ
S04bsu016_u:4609: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako 'nupūrveṇa yena śroṇāparānte janapade kaliṅgavanaṃ nāma nagaram,
S04bsu016_u:4611: upetya siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ nāma bhikṣuṇīṃ paryeṣamāṇaḥ pratisattvaṃ paripṛcchan yato yataḥ paryaṭati,
S04bsu016_u:4612: tena tenaiva anekāni kumāraśatāni anekāni kumārikāśatāni rathyācatvaraśṛṅgāṭakebhyaḥ saṃbhūya anubadhnanti sma /

S04bsu016_u:4629: sarveṣu ca teṣu nānāratnavṛkṣamūleṣu vicitramanojñarūpāṇi ratnasiṃhāsanāni prajñaptāni acintyānekavividharatnavyūhāni,
S04bsu016_u:4646: mahābrahmavihāramasaṃkhyeyalokadhātvadhiṣṭhānākāśakośavipulāpramāṇāvakāśaṃ tatsūryaprabhaṃ mahodyānamapaśyat siṃhavijṛmbhitāyā bhikṣuṇyā mahatā acintyarddhiprabhāvabalādhānena //

S04bsu016_u:4648_0: sarveṣu ca teṣu nānāratnavṛkṣamūlagateṣu mahāsiṃhāsaneṣu siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ
S04bsu016_u:4648_2: śāntamanasaṃ suguptāṃ jitendriyāṃ nāgamiva sudāntāṃ hradamiva acchānāvilaviprasannacittāṃ

S04bsu016_u:4698: atha siṃhavijṛmbhitāyā bhikṣuṇyāḥ sarvaṃ tanmahodyānaṃ saparṣanmaṇḍalavyūhamudāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭamavabhāsitam /
S04bsu016_u:4699: anekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā evaṃ saṃjānāti - pradakṣiṇīkurvaṃśca samantādabhimukhaṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīmadrākṣīt /

S04bsu016_u:4711: āha - etanmama kulaputra jñānālokamukhamāyūhatyā niryūhatyāḥ sarvadharmopapanno nāma samādhirājāyate,
S04bsu016_u:4712_0: yasya samādheḥ sahapratilābhena manomayaiḥ kāyaiḥ sarvāsu daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣvekajātipratibaddhānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:4717: ye ca sattvā mamedaṃ buddhapūjopasthānakarma prajānanti,

S04bsu016_u:4733: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ bodhisattvānāmanantamadhyadharmadhātvavatīrṇānāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum,
S04bsu016_u:4734: ye te sarvadharmamanyanāvihāriṇaśca ekaparyaṅkena ca sarvadharmadhātuṃ spharanti /

S04bsu016_u:4747_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ siṃhavijṛmbhitāyā bhikṣuṇyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya
S04bsu016_u:4760: taṃ sarvabodhisattvakarmasmṛtyupādānārambhanistīraṇapraṇidhiṃ paripūrayan anupūrveṇa yena durge janapade ratnavyūhaṃ nagaraṃ tenopasaṃkrānto vasumitrāṃ bhāgavatīṃ parimārgan /
S04bsu016_u:4761: tatra ye puruṣā vasumitrāyā bhāgavatyā guṇānabhijñā jñānagocarāvidhijñāśca,
S04bsu016_u:4762_0: teṣāmetadabhavat - kimasya evaṃ śāntadāntendriyasya evaṃ saṃprajānasya evamabhrāntasya
S04bsu016_u:4773: ye punarvasumitrāyā bhāgavatyā guṇaviśeṣābhijñā jñānagocarapratyakṣā vā,

S04bsu016_u:4783: tenopasaṃkramya tadgṛhamadrākṣīdvipulaṃ ca vistīrṇaṃ ca daśaratnaprākāraparikṣiptaṃ daśaratnatālapaṅktiparivṛttam /
S04bsu016_u:4788_0: sa tatrāpaśyadvasumitrāṃ bhāgavatīmabhirūpāṃ prāsādikāṃ darśanīyāṃ paramayā śubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā
S04bsu016_u:4790_0: tayā ca sarvaṃ tadgṛhaṃ sarvaratnabhavanavimānavyūhaṃ svaśarīraniryātayā premaṇīyayā

S04bsu016_u:4829: atīte 'dhvani atyuccagāmī nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu016_u:4830: tasya kulaputra atyuccagāminastathāgatasya sattvānāmanukampārthaṃ sumukhāṃ nāma rājadhānīṃ praviśataḥ indrakīlamākrāmataḥ sarvaṃ tannagaraṃ prākampata /
S04bsu016_u:4831: vipulavistīrṇaṃ ca anekaratnamayaṃ saṃsthitamabhūt anekaratnaprabhāvyūhaṃ vividharatnapuṣpābhikīrṇaṃ nānādivyatūryapramuktanirghoṣam /
S04bsu016_u:4833: ahaṃ ca kulaputra tena samayena sumatirnāma śreṣṭhibhāryā abhūvam /
S04bsu016_u:4834: tato me buddhaprātihāryasaṃcoditayā svāminā sārdhaṃ pradhāvitvā tasya tathāgatasya vīthīmukhamupasaṃkrāntasya udāraprasādajātayā ekā ratnakākaṇiḥ pratipāditā /
S04bsu016_u:4842: tatra veṣṭhilo nāma gṛhapatiścandanapīṭhaṃ tathāgatacaityaṃ pūjayati /

S04bsu016_u:4848: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena śubhapāraṃgame nagare veṣṭhilasya gṛhapaterniveśanaṃ tenopajagāma /

S04bsu016_u:4855: so 'vocat - āhaṃ kulaputra aparyādattakoṭīgatasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya lābhī /
S04bsu016_u:4856: na mama kulaputra saṃtānāttathāgataḥ parinirvṛto na parinirvāti na parinirvāsyati sarvalokadhātuṣu atyantaparinirvāṇena anyatra vainayikasattvavaśamupādāya /
S04bsu016_u:4858: tacca me caityadvāramuddhāṭayato 'kṣayabuddhavaṃśavyūho nāma bodhisattvasamādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:4859: etaṃ cāhaṃ kulaputra samādhiṃ cittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe samāpadye /
S04bsu016_u:4862_0: āha - etaṃ mama kulaputra samādhiṃ samāpannasya asmin lokadhātuvaṃśe buddhaparaṃparayā
S04bsu016_u:4863: buddhadarśanānusaṃdhau buddhaparaṃparānupacchedena cittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe buddhaśataṃ paśyāmi /
S04bsu016_u:4866: evaṃ buddhakoṭīṃ buddhakoṭīśataṃ buddhakoṭīsahasraṃ buddhakoṭīśatasahasraṃ buddhakoṭyayutaṃ buddhakoṭīniyutaṃ buddhakoṭīkaṅkaraṃ buddhakoṭībimbaram /
S04bsu016_u:4903: yathā ceha lokadhātuvaṃśe pūrvāntāparāntaparyāpannānāṃ buddhaparaṃparāṃ paśyāmi,
S04bsu016_u:4905: tathā daśasu dikṣu anabhilāpyānabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu atītānāgateṣu lokadhātuvaṃśeṣu sarvatathāgataparaṃparāmavatarāmi /
S04bsu016_u:4908_2: ca daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu vairocanapramukhānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ paraṃparāmavatarāmi /
S04bsu016_u:4923_0: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ tryadhvaikakṣaṇajñānapratilabdhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ kṣaṇakoṭīsamādhivyūhavihāriṇāṃ
S04bsu016_u:4928: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:4931: gaccho hi sūdhana śirījalarājamadhye girirājapotalaki śobhani śūrabhāge /
S04bsu016_u:4933: tasmiṃśca parvatavare viharāti dhīro avalokiteśvaru vidū jagato hitāya /
S04bsu016_u:4934: taṃ gaccha pṛccha sudhanā guṇa nāyakānāṃ deśiṣyate vipulaśobhi nayapraveśam // 2 //
S04bsu016_u:4935: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako veṣṭhilasya gṛhapateḥ pādau śirasābhivandya veṣṭhilaṃ gṛhapatimanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ
S04bsu016_u:4939: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako veṣṭhilasya gṛhapateranuśāsanīmanuvicintayan,
S04bsu016_u:4948_0: tadacintyaṃ tathāgatakarmābhimukhīkurvan anupūrveṇa yena potalakaḥ parvatastenopasaṃkramya
S04bsu016_u:4948_1: potalakaṃ parvatamabhiruhya avalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ parimārgan parigaveṣamāṇo
S04bsu016_u:4948_5: deśayamānaṃ sarvajagatsaṃgrahaviṣayaṃ mahāmaitrīmahākarūṇāmukhodyotaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayantam /
S04bsu016_u:4949_0: dṛṣṭvā ca punastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ praharṣitavikasitānimiṣanayanaḥ
S04bsu016_u:4950: atha khalu avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvaḥ sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ dūrata eva āgacchantamavalokya āmantrayāmāsa - ehi /
S04bsu016_u:4952_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvastenopasaṃkramya
S04bsu016_u:4952_1: avalokiteśvara bodhisattvasya pādau śirasābhivandya avalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ (Gv 160)
S04bsu016_u:4953: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā ārya,
S04bsu016_u:4955: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:4957: śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /

S04bsu016_u:4960_2: pāṇiṃ sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya mūrdhni pratiṣṭhāpya evamāha - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
S04bsu016_u:4962: ahaṃ kulaputra mahākaruṇāmukhāvilambaṃ nāma bodhisattvacaryāmukhaṃ prajānāmi /
S04bsu016_u:4964: so 'haṃ kulaputra mahākaruṇāmukhāvilambabodhisattvacaryāmukhe pratiṣṭhitaḥ sarvatathāgatānāṃ ca pādamulānna vicalāmi,
S04bsu016_u:4971: tena mayā kulaputra idaṃ mahākaruṇāmukhāvilambaṃ bodhisattvacaryāmukhaṃ pariśodhayatā sarvajagatpratiśaraṇapraṇidhirutpāditaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:4979: anenopāyena sattvān sarvabhayebhyaḥ parimocya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya avivartyān karomi buddhadharmapratilābhāya /
S04bsu016_u:4982_0: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ samantabhadrāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sarvabuddhapraṇidhānamaṇḍalaviśuddhānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:4984: kṛtvā pradakṣiṇu stavitva ca gauraveṇa prakānta dakṣiṇapathaṃ sudhanaḥ sudāntaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:4986: vajrāmaye giritaṭe maṇiratnacitre siṃhāsane padumagarbhi niṣaṇṇa dhīro /
S04bsu016_u:4988: dṛṣṭvopajāta atulā sudhanasya prīti upagamya vandati kramau guṇasāgarasya /
S04bsu016_u:4989: ovāca dehi mama ārya kṛpāṃ janitvā śikṣāṃ tu ahu labhe ima bhadracaryām // 3 //
S04bsu016_u:4990: bāhuṃ praṇamya vimalaṃ śatapuṇyacitraṃ prabhameghajāla vipulaṃ śubha muñcamānaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:4991: mūrdhni sthihitva sudhanasya viśuddhasattvo avalokiteśvaru vidū vacanaṃ bhaṇāti // 4 //
S04bsu016_u:4992: ekaṃ vimokṣamukha jānami buddhaputra sarvajināna karuṇāghanajñānagarbham /
S04bsu016_u:4993: saṃbhūta sarvajagatrāyaṇasaṃgrahāya sarvatra vartati mamāpyatha ātmaprema // 5 //
S04bsu016_u:4994: trāyāmi sarvajanatāṃ vyasanairanekaiḥ ye gāḍhabandhanagatāriṣu hastaprāptāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:4995: gātreṣu viddha tatha cārakasaṃniruddhā mucyanti bandhanagatā mama nāma śrutvā // 6 //
S04bsu016_u:4997: utsṛṣṭaḥ vadhya nṛpatīna kṛtāparādhāḥ kṣiptā iṣu na ca kramanti śarīri teṣām /
S04bsu016_u:4998: chidyanti śastra parivartati tīkṣṇa dhārā ye nāmadheyu mama tatra anusmaranti // 7 //
S04bsu016_u:4999: rājāna madhyagata ye ca vivādaprāptā vijinanti sarvaripavo 'tha śubhe labhante /
S04bsu016_u:5000: vardhanti sarva yaśa mitrakule dhanāni bhontī adharṣiya smaritvana mahya nāma // 8 //
S04bsu016_u:5002: gacchanti nirbhaya jinitvana sarvaśatrūn ye nāmadheyu mama kecidanusmaranti // 9 //
S04bsu016_u:5003: kṣiptā manāgiritaṭītu praduṣṭacittairaṅgārakarṣu jvalitā api co vadhārtham /
S04bsu016_u:5004: padmāṅkurā jalanidhi jvalanā bhavanti ye nāmadheyu mama kecidanusmaranti // 10 //
S04bsu016_u:5005: prakṣipta sāgarajale na marenti tatra nadyāṃ na cohyati na dahyati cāgnimadhye /
S04bsu016_u:5006: sarve anartha na bhavantyapi cārthasiddhiḥ nāmaṃ mamā anusmaritva muhūrtakaṃ pi // 11 //
S04bsu016_u:5007: haḍidaṇḍabandhanigaḍāśca tathā kudaṇḍā avamānanā tatha vimānana ṭhambhanāśca /
S04bsu016_u:5008: ākrośatāḍanavibhartsanatarjanāśca mama nāmadheyu smaramāṇa labhanti mokṣam // 12 //
S04bsu016_u:5009: ye vairiṇo vivarachidragaveṣiṇaśca nityapraduṣṭamana ye ca avarṇavādī /
S04bsu016_u:5010: sahadarśanena tada maitramanā bhavanti bheṣyanti varṇi śruta mahya smaritva nāma // 13 //
S04bsu016_u:5011: vetālamantratha kakhorda sadā prayuktā ghātārtha teṣa ripavaḥ stimitā bhavanti /
S04bsu016_u:5013: teṣa śarīri na kramanti viṣā aśeṣā ye nāmadheṣu mama kecidanusmaranti // 14 //
S04bsu016_u:5015: ojoharairbhayakaraiḥ supināntare 'pi śāmyanti sarvi mama nāma anusmaritvā // 15 //
S04bsu016_u:5017: na dhanakṣayo nāpi upaiti daridrabhāvaṃ nāmaṃ mamā anusaritva muhūrtakaṃ pi // 16 //
S04bsu016_u:5018: na ca gacchati cyuta ito narakaṃ avīciṃ na tiraścayoni na ca preta na cākṣaṇāni /
S04bsu016_u:5019: deve manuṣya upapadyati śuddhasattvo yo nāmadheyu mama kecidanusmaranti // 17 //
S04bsu016_u:5020: na ca andhakāṇabadhirā na pi carcigātrā na ca raudra khañjā atha cāṭaka prekṣaṇīyā /
S04bsu016_u:5021: sarvendriyairavikalā bahukalpakoṭyo bhontī narā mama smaritvana nāmadheyam // 18 //
S04bsu016_u:5022: avalokiteti mama te sugatiṃ vajranti yo puṣpamuṣṭi mama okirate śarīre /
S04bsu016_u:5023: dhūpāṃśca dhūpayati yaśca dadāti chatraṃ vistārikai puja karoti prasannacitto
S04bsu016_u:5024: mama buddhakṣetri sa ca bheṣyati dakṣiṇīyaḥ // 19 //
S04bsu016_u:5025: upapadyate itu cyavitvana śuddhasattvo buddhāna saṃmukha daśaddiśi lokadhātau /
S04bsu016_u:5026: buddhāṃśca paśyati śṛṇoti ca teṣa dharmaṃ ye nāmadheyu mama kecidanusmaranti // 20 //
S04bsu016_u:5027: ete tathānya kṣayituṃ nimituṃ na śakyā yāvaccupāyi ahu sattva vinemi loke /
S04bsu016_u:5028: eko vimokṣa mama bhāvitu buddhaputra nāhaṃ guṇān guṇadharāṇa vijāni sarvān // 21 //
S04bsu016_u:5030: aṣṭāpadākṛtu daśaddiśi lokadhātau kalyāṇamitra samupāsita sūdhanena /
S04bsu016_u:5031: na ca tṛptu dharma śruṇamāṇu jinaurasānāṃ kasmānna prīti bhavati śruṇamāna dharmam // 22 //
S04bsu016_u:5032: tena khalu punaḥ samayena ananyagāmī nāma bodhisattvaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaganatalenāgatya sahāyā lokadhātoścakravālaśikhare pratyaṣṭhāt /
S04bsu016_u:5033: samantarapratiṣṭhāpitau ca ananyagāminā bodhisattvena sahāyā lokadhātoścakravālaśikhare pādau,
S04bsu016_u:5036: tathārūpā ca ananyagāminā bodhisattvena kāyāt prabhā pramuktā,
S04bsu016_u:5046: tasmiṃśca potalake parvate 'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasyāntikamupasaṃkrāntaḥ saṃdṛśyate sma //
S04bsu016_u:5047: atha khalu avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvaḥ sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - paśyasi tvaṃ kulaputra ananyagāminaṃ bodhisattvamiha parṣanmaṇḍale saṃprāptam?

S04bsu016_u:6241: tatra ye sattvāḥ suvarṇā abhūvannudārādhimuktikāḥ saṃpūrṇagātrā abhirūpā darśanīyāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:6242: ta evaṃ vācamabhāṣanta - ahaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa suvarṇatarastvatsakāśāditi /
S04bsu016_u:6245: te tena anyonyāvamānanāsamuditena akuśalamūlena āyuḥpramāṇādapi parihīyante sma,
S04bsu016_u:6248: tasya khalu bodhimaṇḍasya purato ratnakusumavidyuddharmanigarjitameghaghoṣaṃ nāma gandhodakasaro 'bhūddaśaratnadrumakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraparivāram /
S04bsu016_u:6249: sarve ca te ratnavṛkṣā bodhivṛkṣasaṃsthānā abhūvan /
S04bsu016_u:6250: tasya khalu punā ratnakusumavidyuddharmanigarjitameghaghoṣasya mahāgandhodakasarasaḥ sarvamaṇiratnasuvibhaktanicitāni kūlānyabhūvan,
S04bsu016_u:6255: tatra mahāpadme samantajñānārciśrīguṇaketudhvajo nāma tathāgataḥ prādurbabhūva teṣāṃ sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ prathamakalpikaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:6257: so 'nekavarṣasahasrāṇi dharmaśravaṇena sattvān paripācya daśavarṣasahasraṃ raśmyavabhāsavikurvitena paripācayāmāsa tatra daśabhirvarṣasahasraiḥ sa tathāgataḥ prādurbhaviṣyatīti /
S04bsu016_u:6259: yayā raśmyā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ saṃjānanti sma - daśabhirvarṣasahasraistathāgata utpatsyata iti,
S04bsu016_u:6262: yayā raśmyā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ sarvarūpāṇi sūkṣmāṇyapaśyan - aṣṭābhirvarṣasahasraiḥ sa tathāgata utpatsyata iti /
S04bsu016_u:6263: yattata eva mahābodhivṛkṣāt sarvasattvakarmavipākanirghoṣā nāma raśmirniścacāra,
S04bsu016_u:6264: yayā raśmyā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ svakasvakān karmasamudrānavataranti sma,
S04bsu016_u:6265: karmasmṛtijñānaṃ ca pratyalabhanta - saptabhirvarṣasahasraiḥ sa tathāgata utpatsyata iti /
S04bsu016_u:6266: yattata eva mahābodhivṛkṣāt sarvakuśalamūlasaṃbhavanirghoṣā nāma raśmirniścacāra,
S04bsu016_u:6267: yayā raśmyā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ paripūrṇā avikalasarvendriyāḥ saṃtiṣṭhante sma - ṣaḍbhirvarṣasahasraiḥ sa tathāgata utpatsyata iti /
S04bsu016_u:6269: yayā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ udārātiśayatayā vikurvanti sma - pañcabhirvarṣasahasraiḥ sa tathāgata utpatsyata iti /
S04bsu016_u:6271: yayā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ sarvākārāṃ buddhakṣetrapariśuddhimadrākṣuḥ caturbhirvarṣasahasraiḥ sa tathāgata utpatsyata iti /
S04bsu016_u:6272: yattata eva mahābodhivṛkṣāt sarvatathāgataviṣayāsaṃbhedapradīpā nāma raśmirniścacāra,
S04bsu016_u:6273: yayā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ tasya tathāgatasya sarvatrānugatavikurvitamavataranti sma - tribhirvarṣasahasraiḥ sa tathāgata utpatsyata iti /
S04bsu016_u:6275: yayā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ tathāgatamabhimukhamadhimucyāpaśyan - dvābhyāṃ varṣasahasrābhyāṃ sa tathāgata utpasyata iti /
S04bsu016_u:6276: yattata eva mahābodhivṛkṣāt tryadhvajñānavidyutpradīpā nāma raśmirniścacāra satathāgatapūrvayoganirghoṣā nāma,
S04bsu016_u:6277: yayā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ tasya tathāgatasya pūrvayogasamudrānavakalpayāmāsuravataranti
S04bsu016_u:6278: sma - varṣasahasreṇa sa tathāgata utpatsyata iti /
S04bsu016_u:6280: yayā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ samantacakṣuṣkatāṃ pratyalabhanta sarvatathāgatavikurvitabuddhakṣetrasarvasattvadarśanatāyai - varṣaśatena sa tathāgata utpatsyata iti /
S04bsu016_u:6282: yayā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ tathāgatotpādasaṃjñāṃ pratyalabhanta - saptāhena sa tathāgata utpatsyata iti /
S04bsu016_u:6284: yayā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ buddhadarśanamahāprītivegasaṃjātā abhūvan /
S04bsu016_u:6285: iti hi kulaputra ebhirevaṃrūpairapramāṇaiḥ raśmiparipācananayairdaśavarṣasahasrāṇi sattvān paripācya saptame divase pūrṇe (Gv 210)
S04bsu016_u:6286: sarvaṃ taṃ lokadhātumapramāṇaiḥ saṃkampananayaiḥ saṃkampya ekāntapariśuddhāmadhyatiṣṭhat yāvaddaśasu dikṣu sarvatathāgatānāṃ buddhakṣetrapariśuddhiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:6287: tāmapi sarvāṃ praticittakṣaṇaṃ tatra buddhakṣetranānāvidhācintyavyūhān saṃdarśayāmāsa /
S04bsu016_u:6288: atha paścime saptāhe ye tatra lokadhātau sattvā buddhadarśanaparipakvāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:6290_0: atha khalu tasmin lokadhātau sarvacakravālebhya sarvasumerubhyaḥ sarvaparvatebhyaḥ
S04bsu016_u:6291: teṣāṃ ca mahāratnarājapadmaparivārāṇāṃ mahāratnapadmānāṃ kesarakarṇikāsu daśabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāni mahāmaṇiratnagarbhāṇi siṃhāsanāni prādurabhūvan /
S04bsu016_u:6292: teṣu ca maṇiratnagarbheṣvāsaneṣu daśabuddhakṣetraśatasahasraparamāṇurajaḥsamā bodhisattvāḥ paryaṅkaniṣaṇṇāḥ prādurbabhūvuḥ //
S04bsu016_u:6293: samanantarābhisaṃbuddhasya tasya bhagavataḥ samantajñānaratnārciśrīguṇaketurājñaḥ tathāgatasya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim,
S04bsu016_u:6294: atha tāvadeva daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātutathāgatā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya yathāśayānāṃ sattvānāmabhimukhaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartayāmāsuḥ /
S04bsu016_u:6295: tena tato lokadhātoraprameyāḥ sattvāḥ sarvadurgativinipātebhyo vinivartitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:6314_0: evaṃ tasya tathāgatasya acintyena buddhavṛṣabhitāvikurvitena dharmacakraṃ pravartayataḥ
S04bsu016_u:6314_1: praticittakṣaṇamanantāprameyāḥ sattvā dvitīyāyāṃ tṛtīyāyāṃ caturthyāṃ pañcabhyāṃ
S04bsu016_u:6318: evaṃ tasya tathāgatasya acintyena buddhavṛṣabhitāvikurvitena dharmacakraṃ pravartayataḥ praticittakṣaṇamanantamadhyasattvadhāturvinayamagamat /
S04bsu016_u:6319: tasmiṃśca lokadhātau sarvasattvā yathāśayāstasya tathāgatasya nānātmabhāvopāyakauśalyapramuktāṃ dharmadeśanāmājānanti sma //
S04bsu016_u:6320_0: tasyāṃ khalu punā ratnakusumapradīpāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ rūpavarṇaviṣayaparibhogamadamattānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:6323: yā ca rājñaścakravartino vairocanaratnapadmagarbhaśrīcūḍasya svaśarīraniryātā prabhā,
S04bsu016_u:6329: sā ca sarvā na prajñāyate sma /
S04bsu016_u:6330: tadyathāpi nāma āditye udite vigate 'ndhakāre na candragrahanakṣatrajyotiṣāṃ nāgnerna maṇīnāṃ prabhā prajñāyate sma,
S04bsu016_u:6331: evameva samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya prabhayābhibhūtāḥ tatra jambudvīpe sarvaprabhā na prajñāyate sma /
S04bsu016_u:6332: tadyathāpi nāma jāmbūnadakanakabimbasya purato maṣivigraho na śobhate na bhāsate na tapati na virocate,
S04bsu016_u:6333: evameva samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya purataḥ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ rūpakāyā na śobhante,
S04bsu016_u:6337: teṣāmetadabhavat - ko 'nvayaṃ bhaviṣyati devo vā brahmā vā,
S04bsu016_u:6340: na tapāmo na virocāmahe kāyena vā prabhayā vā śubhayā vā varṇena vā tejasā vā?
S04bsu016_u:6342_0: atha khalu samantabhadro bodhisattvaḥ tasyā ratnakusumapradīpāyā rājadhānyā madhye
S04bsu016_u:6342_2: taṃ vairocanaratnapadmagarbhaśrīcūḍaṃ rājānaṃ cakravartinametadavocat - yat khalu
S04bsu016_u:6342_3: mahārāja jānīyāḥ - tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka utpannaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:6344_1: bodhisattvasya rūpakāyaṃ dṛṣṭvā prabhāvikurvitamābharaṇanirghoṣaṃ ca śrutvā mahāprītiprāmodyavegajātā
S04bsu016_u:6344_2: tasyāṃ velāyāmevaṃ cittamutpādayāmāsa - yanme kiṃcidupacitakuśalamūlaṃ tenāhamīdṛśaṃ
S04bsu016_u:6349: yathā anenāndhakārāyāṃ rātrau sattvānāmavabhāsaṃ saṃjanayya buddhotpādaḥ saṃprakāśitaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:6353: atha khalu kulaputra vairocanaratnapadmagarbhaśrīcūḍaścakravartī sādha caturaṅgena balakāyena,
S04bsu016_u:6358_0: mahatā rājānubhāvena tasyā ratnakusumapradīpāyā rājadhānyā uccālya yojanamūrdhvaṃ
S04bsu016_u:6358_1: vihāyasyabhyudgamya sarvaṃ jambudvīpaṃ sarvāvatīṃ cāturdvīpikalokadhātuṃ mahāvabhāsena
S04bsu016_u:6390_1: śirasābhivandya taṃ bhagavantamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tasya bhagavataḥ
S04bsu016_u:6392_0: atha tānyābharaṇāni tasya bhagavataḥ upari mūrdhasaṃdhau mahāmaṇiratnābharaṇacchatraṃ
S04bsu016_u:6393: tasya madhye dharmadhātuprabhavasarvaratnamaṇiśākhāpralambaṃ nāma mahābodhivṛkṣamadrākṣīt anantamadhyavyūhanirdeśaṃ pradakṣiṇanānāvyūhasaṃdarśanam /
S04bsu016_u:6405: tāsu ca lokadhātuṣvekaikasmin lokadhātau buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān lokadhātūnadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:6426: dṛṣṭvā ca bhūyasyā mātrayā mahāprītiprasādavegān pratyalabhata //
S04bsu016_u:6428: tasyāstaṃ sūtrāntaṃ śrutvā daśa samādhimukhaśatasahasrāṇyavakrāntāni mṛdūni sukhasaṃsparśanāni /
S04bsu016_u:6429: tadyathāpi nāma taddivasāvakrāntasya garbhasya mātuḥ kukṣau vijñānam,
S04bsu016_u:6446_0: sā sūkṣmasamāhitacittā aniñjanacittā praharṣitacittā samāśvāsitacittā anābhāsacittā
S04bsu016_u:6446_4: abhinnacittā anunnatacittā anavanatacittā akhinnacittā anivartyacittā asaṃsīdanacittā
S04bsu016_u:6448: daśabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamaiḥ praṇidhānasamudraiḥ sarvatathāgatānāṃ pūrvapraṇidhānaṃ svabuddhakṣetrapariśuddhaye 'bhinirharati sma,
S04bsu016_u:6452: sa bhagavān samantajñānaratnārciśrīguṇaketurājastathāgataḥ pūrvakuśalamūlāni saṃcodayati udyotayati saṃdarśayati vivṛṇoti vibhajati saṃprakāśayati sārīkaroti avipraṇāśatāyai,
S04bsu016_u:6456_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra atīte 'dhvani tataḥ pareṇa daśame kalpe maṇisūryacandravidyotitaprabhāyāṃ
S04bsu016_u:6460: sā tena kuśalamūlena avinipātadharmiṇī sadā devendrakuleṣu manuṣyendrakuleṣu copapannā,
S04bsu016_u:6461: sarvatra cābhirūpābhūt prāsādikā darśanīyā paramaśubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatā /
S04bsu016_u:6463: tenaiva ca kalyāṇamitreṇa tasyāṃ tasyāṃ jātau paripācitā saṃcoditā smāritā /
S04bsu016_u:6464: etarhi ca punastayā samantabhadro bodhisattva ārāgito 'tyantāvirāgaṇatayā //
S04bsu016_u:6465: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena vairocanaratnapadmagarbhaśrīprabhācūḍo nāma rājacakravartī?
S04bsu016_u:6466: na khalu punaste kulaputra evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu016_u:6467: maitreyaḥ sa bodhisattvaḥ tena kālena tena samayena vairocanaratnapadmagarbhaśrīprabhācūḍo nāma rājābhūccakravartī /
S04bsu016_u:6468: syātkhalu punaste kulaputra evam - anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena saṃpūrṇaśrīvakrā nāma rājabhāryābhūt?
S04bsu016_u:6472: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena samantajñānārciḥpadmabhadrābhirāmanetraśrīcandrā nāma rājaduhitā abhūt?
S04bsu016_u:6474: ahaṃ sā tena kālena tena samayena samantajñānārciḥpadmabhadrābhirāmanetraśrīcandrā nāma rājaduhitā abhūvam /
S04bsu016_u:6475: yanme dārikābhūtayā indradhvajaketostathāgatasya pravacane pralugnastathāgatavigrahaḥ padmodgataḥ pratisaṃskāritaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:6477: yadā cāsmi samantabhadreṇa bodhisattvena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā,
S04bsu016_u:6478: sa me kulaputra prathamacittotpādo bodhāya abhūt /
S04bsu016_u:6479: yadā ca sa me bhagavān samantajñānārciḥśrīguṇaketurājaḥ tathāgata upasaṃkramya ābharaṇairavakīrṇaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:6480: tathāgatavikurvitaprātihāryaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā dharmaśca me tasya bhagavato 'ntikācchrutaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:6482: sarve ca te sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatā ārāgitā abhirādhitāḥ, (Gv 216)
S04bsu016_u:6487_0: teṣu ca me tathāgateṣu tīvraṃ gauravaṃ pratilabdhaṃ yathārūpeṇa gauraveṇa ekacittakṣaṇe
S04bsu016_u:6487_1: tān sarvāṃstathāgatāṃstāni bodhisattvaparṣanmaṇḍalāni tāni ca sarvāṇi buddhakṣetrāṇi paśyāmi //
S04bsu016_u:6488: tasyāṃ ca vairocanaśriyāṃ lokadhātau saṃvṛttāyāṃ tatra ca virajomaṇḍale kalpe nirgate 'nantare maṇicakravicitrapratimaṇḍitavyūhā nāma lokadhāturmahāprabhaśca nāma kalpo 'bhūt /
S04bsu016_u:6491: tasmiṃśca khalu mahāprabhe kalpe mahākaruṇameghadhvajo nāma tathāgataḥ prāthamakalpiko 'bhūt /
S04bsu016_u:6495: tena ca me sarvabuddhotpādasaṃbhavo nāma sūtrāntaḥ saṃprakāśito daśabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamasūtrāntaparivāraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:6499: tena ca me tryadhvāvabhāsagarbho nāma sūtrāntaḥ saṃprakāśito jambudvīpaparamāṇurajaḥsamasūtrāntaparivāraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:6501: tasyānantaraṃ sarvadharmasamudrābhyudgatavegarājo nāma tathāgato loka udapādi /
S04bsu016_u:6503: tena ca me sarvadharmadhātutalajñānabhedo nāma sūtrāntaḥ saṃprakāśitaḥ pañcasūtrāntaśataparivāraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:6507: tena ca me prītisāgaravivardhanavego nāma sūtrāntaḥ saṃprakāśito daśasūtrāntakoṭīśatasahasraparivāraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:6510: sa ca me sāgaradevatābhūtayā ratnapadmameghavarṣairupasaṃkramya pūjitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:6511: tena ca me dharmadhātusāgaranayaprabho nāma sūtrāntaḥ saṃprakāśito daśabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamasūtrāntaparivāraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:6515: sa me pañcābhijñaṛṣibhūtayā maharddhivikurvitena ṣaṣṭiṛṣisahasraparivṛtayā upasaṃkramaya gandhapuṣpaśikharameghānabhipravarṣantyā pūjitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:6516: tena ca me anālayadharmapradīpo nāma sūtrāntaḥ saṃprakāśitaḥ ṣaṣṭisūtrāntasahasraparivāraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:6519: ahaṃ ca samatārthasaṃbhavā nāma pṛthivīdevatā abhuvam /
S04bsu016_u:6520: sā ahamaprameyapṛthivīdevatāparivārā sarvaratnadrumakośebhyo ratnapuṣpameghavarṣāṇyutsṛjamānā sarvaratnahārameghān pravarṣamāṇā upasaṃkrāntā tasya tathāgatasya pūjākarmaṇe /
S04bsu016_u:6521: tena ca me sarvatathāgatasaṃbhavajñānākaragarbho nāma sūtrāntaḥ saṃprakāśito 'prameyasūtrāntaparivāraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:6522: sa ca me śrutvā dhārito na vipraṇāśitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:6523: teṣāṃ khalu kulaputra pañcānāṃ buddhaśatānāṃ sarvapaścimo dharmadhātugaganapūrṇaratnaśikharaśrīpradīpo nāma tathāgato loka udapādi /
S04bsu016_u:6524: ahaṃ ca tena kālena abhirāmaśrīvakrā nāma (Gv 217)
S04bsu016_u:6526: sā ahaṃ tasya tathāgatasya nagarapraveśasamaye nāṭake pravṛtte buddhānubhāvena ūrdhvaṃ gaganatale sthitvā gāthāsahasreṇa taṃ tathāgatamabhiṣṭuvantī upasaṃkrāntā /
S04bsu016_u:6527: tena ca me dharmadhātuvidyotitavyūhaṃ nāma raśmimūrṇakośādutsṛjya sarvakāyo 'vabhāsitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:6528: tayā ca me raśmyā samanantaraspṛṣṭayā dharmadhātunayāvartagarbho nāma vimokṣaḥ pratilabdhaḥ //
S04bsu016_u:6529: iti hi kulaputra etān pramukhān kṛtvā yāni tatra maṇicakravicitrapratimaṇḍitavyūhāyāṃ lokadhātau mahāprabhe kalpe pañca buddhaśatānyutpannāni,
S04bsu016_u:6531: pūjā ca me teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ kṛtā /
S04bsu016_u:6535: ekaikasya ca me tathāgatasyāntikamupasaṃkrāmantyā aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānāmarthaḥ kṛto buddhadharmasaṃvarṇanatayā /
S04bsu016_u:6536_0: ekaikasya ca me tathāgatasya antikāt tryadhvajñānagarbhadharmadhātuvipulo nāma dharmadhātuśarīrasāgaraḥ
S04bsu016_u:6538: sarveṣāṃ ca me teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ sahadarśanāt sarvajñatāvidyudavabhāsā āśaye 'vakrāntā apratilabdhapūrvā adṛṣṭapūrvāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:6542_0: atha khalu samantasattvatrāṇojaḥśrī rātridevatā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tameva sarvalokābhimukhajagadvinayanidarśanaṃ
S04bsu016_u:6542_1: bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā pradarśayamānā buddhādhiṣṭhānena sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ

S04bsu016_u:7310: munerbalārambaṇacittameghāḥ kṣāntiṃ labhante ta idaṃ niśāmya // 7 //
S04bsu016_u:7314: aśeṣasattvānugatā ca maitrī naye jinānāṃ ta ihāvatīrṇāḥ // 9 //

S04bsu016_u:7337: dharmārthiko dharmagaveṣyakhinnaḥ śrutvā ca taṃ dhārayituṃ samarthaḥ // 20 //
S04bsu016_u:7341: bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra atīte 'dhvani lokadhātusamudraparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ pareṇa parataraṃ maṇikanakaparvataśikharavairocano nāma lokadhātusamudro 'bhūt /
S04bsu016_u:7342: tasmin khalu punaḥ kulaputra maṇikanakaparvataśikharavairocanalokadhātusamudre jñānaparvatadharmadhātudikpratapanatejorājo nāma tathāgato 'bhūt /
S04bsu016_u:7343_1: pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā sa maṇikanakaparvataśikharavairocano lokadhātusamudraḥ pariśodhitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7351: ekaikasmiṃśca sūtrānte lokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamā bodhisattvavyākaraṇanirdeśāḥ anantamadhyasattvavinayanirdeśā nānāyānanayaiḥ pravartitā nānāvikurvitaprātihāryavinayatāḥ //
S04bsu016_u:7352: tasmin khalu punarmaṇikanakaparvataśikharavairocane lokadhātusamudre samantadigabhimukhadvāradhvajavyūho nāma madhyamo lokadhātuvaṃśo 'bhūt /
S04bsu016_u:7353: tasmin khalu punaḥ kulaputra samantadigabhimukhadvāradhvajavyūhe madhyame lokadhātuvaṃśe sarvaratnavarṇasamantaprabhāsaśrīrnāma lokadhāturabhūt /
S04bsu016_u:7356: teṣāṃ ca sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ cāturdvīpakānāṃ sarvaratnaśikharadhvajo nāma madhyamaścāturdvīpako 'bhūt /
S04bsu016_u:7357: tasmin khalu punaḥ sarvaratnaśikharadhvaje cāturdvīpake lokadhātau aprameyayojanaśatasahasrāyāmavistārāścatvāro dvīpā abhūvan /
S04bsu016_u:7359: tasmiṃśca khalu punaḥ cāturdvīpake jambudvīpakasya madhye ratnasālavyūhameghapradīpā nāma rājadhānyabhūddaśanagarasahasraparivārā /
S04bsu016_u:7360: tasmin khalu punarjambudvīpe daśa varṣasahasrāṇi manuṣyāṇāmāyuṣpramāṇamabhūt /

S04bsu016_u:7364: sapta putraśatānyabhūvan sarveṣāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ sudarśanānāṃ mahātejasāṃ mahābalānām /
S04bsu016_u:7365: tasya khalu punaḥ sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣasya rājñaḥ sarvo jambudvīpa ekacchatro 'bhūnnihataparacakrapratyarthikaḥ //

S04bsu016_u:7369: teṣāmadharmarāgaraktānāṃ viṣamalobhābhibhūtānāṃ mithyādharmaparigatānāṃ na devaḥ kāle vāridhārā udasṛjat yena pṛthivyāṃ bījagrāmāḥ sasyagrāmā viroheyuḥ //
S04bsu016_u:7370: tena khalu punaḥ sattvāḥ śuṣkeṣu tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanodyānadrumeṣu nānāvyādhispṛṣṭā digvidiśo vidhāvanti sma aparāyaṇāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7371: te samāgamya sarva eva yena ratnasālavyūhameghapradīparājadhānī tenopasaṃkramya tāṃ samantādanuparivārya kecidūrdhvabāhavaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:7388: ye ca tasyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ strīpuruṣadārakadārikāḥ kṣutpipāsāprapīḍitā nirābharaṇagātrā nagnanirvasanā duṣṭavivarṇā rūkṣaparuṣagātrā duḥkhitā durmanaso 'nāttamanaskāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:7391: aśrauṣīdrājā sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣaḥ tasya mahataḥ samantādyācanakasamūhasya taṃ mahāntamārtasvaramutkrośanaśabdam /
S04bsu016_u:7393: sa mahākaruṇānayacetanānidhyapticitto muhūrtamekāgratāmanubhūya daśa mahākaruṇopasaṃhitāni vacanapadānyudīrayāmāsa /
S04bsu016_u:7396: kadā tadbhaviṣyati yadvayaṃ saṃsāramahāprapātaprapatitānāṃ sattvānāṃ layanabhūtā bhaviṣyāmaḥ tathāgatalayanabhūmipratiṣṭhāpanatayā /

S04bsu016_u:7403: katā tadbhaviṣyati yadvayaṃ vividhalokabhayopadrutānāmaparāyaṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ parāyaṇaṃ bhaviṣyāmo 'tyantayogakṣeme sarvajñatāmārge pratiṣṭhāpanatayā /

S04bsu016_u:7419: tena sarvajambudvīpe sarvarājadhānīṣu sarvagrāmanagaranigamajanapadapattaneṣu sarvopakaraṇakośā vivṛtāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7427: sa teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ yathābhilaṣitasarvābhiprāyaparipūraṇārthaṃ teṣu gṛheṣu pratyekamātmabhāvasadṛśamupādāya kāyamabhinirmāya sthāpayāmāsa /

S04bsu016_u:7464: aṭavīkāntāravipranaṣṭasya taddarśanakāmasya teṣāṃ samavadhānena mahatī prītiradhyavasānamutpadyate taddarśanāvitṛptatayā,
S04bsu016_u:7465: evameva kulaputra rājñaḥ sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣasya teṣāṃ yācanakānāṃ sahadarśanena mahāprītivegāḥ saṃjātāḥ /

S04bsu016_u:7486: sa tān sarvayācanakān sarvāstiparityāgatayā sarvasattveṣu samapratipannaḥ sarvavastuparityāgairabhicchādayāmāsa //
S04bsu016_u:7487: tena khalu punaḥ samayena ratnaprabhā nāma śreṣṭhidārikā ṣaṣṭikanyāparivārā tasminneva mahāyajñavāṭe saṃnipatitābhūt,
S04bsu016_u:7491: paramasaṃprajanyacāriṇī gambhīraceṣṭā meghāsaṃpannā dharmāṇāṃ grahaṇacāraṇapratibodhiṣu pūrvasukṛtakuśalamūlā dharmābhiṣyanditaprasannasaṃtānā (Gv 255)

S04bsu016_u:7495: ekāntasthitā caivaṃ cittamutpādayāmāsa - sulabdhā me lābhā,

S04bsu016_u:7512: tāmevaṃcittamanasikāraprayuktāmājñāya rājā sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣo 'valokya evamāha - gṛhāṇa dārike,

S04bsu016_u:7516: sā prasannacittā udāravipulakuśalamūlavegasaṃjātā rājānaṃ sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣaṃ tasyāṃ velāyāmābhirgāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:7517: pūrve iyaṃ sālaviyūhameghā anopapanne tvayi rājasiṃha /

S04bsu016_u:7632: tatparivārasya ca sarvāsāṃ dārikāṇāṃ pratyekaṃ nānāvastraratnāni prādāt,
S04bsu016_u:7633: evaṃ cāvocat - pratigṛhāṇa dārike tvamida vastraratnam,
S04bsu016_u:7635_0: atha khalu ratnaprabhā śreṣṭhidārikā saparivārā ubhābhyāṃ jānubhyāṃ dharaṇitale praṇipatya
S04bsu016_u:7635_1: tadvastraratnaṃ pāṇibhyāṃ parigṛhya mūrdhni kṛtvā pratyavasṛtya tadvastraratnaṃ prāvṛtavatī /
S04bsu016_u:7636: tatparivārāśca sarvā dārikāḥ pratyekaṃ svāni vastraratnāni prāvṛtavatyaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7637: sā tadvastraratnaṃ prāvṛtya rājānaṃ sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣaṃ pradakṣiṇamakarot sārdhaṃ svena dārikāparivāreṇa /
S04bsu016_u:7638: tāsāṃ sarvāsāṃ teṣu vastraratneṣu sarvanakṣatrajyotirbimbāni vidyotamānānyadarśan /
S04bsu016_u:7639: tāṃ janakāyo dṛṣṭvā evamāha - śobhanastavāyaṃ dārike kanyāparivāraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7640: rātridevateva jyotirgaṇapratimaṇḍitā tvamābhiḥ parivṛtā atīva bhrājase //
S04bsu016_u:7641_0: atha khalu sarvavṛkṣapraphullanasukhasaṃvāsā rātridevatā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat
S04bsu016_u:7641_1: - tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena rājābhūt sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣo nāma?
S04bsu016_u:7643: ayaṃ sa bhagavān vairocanastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastena kālena tena samayena rājā abhūt sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣo nāma /
S04bsu016_u:7644: syātkhalu punaste kulaputra - anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena padmaprabhā nāma devyabhūdrājño jyotiṣprabhasya bhāryā sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣasya rājño mātā?
S04bsu016_u:7646: iyaṃ sā māyādevī tena kālena padmaprabhā nāma rājabhāryā abhūt,
S04bsu016_u:7647: yayā sa upapādukaḥ kumāraḥ utsaṅge pratigṛhītaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7648: syātkhalu punaste kulaputra evaṃ - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena jyotiṣprabho nāma rājā abhūtsarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣasya rājñaḥ pitā?
S04bsu016_u:7650: śuddhodanaḥ sa rājā tena kālena jyotiṣprabho nāma rājā abhūt /
S04bsu016_u:7651: syātkhalu punaste kulaputra evam - anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena ratnaprabhā nāma śreṣṭhidārikā abhūt /
S04bsu016_u:7653: ahaṃ sā tena kālena tena samayena ratnaprabhā nāma śreṣṭhidārikā abhūvam /
S04bsu016_u:7654: syātkhalu punaste kulaputra evam - anye tena kālena tena samayena sattvā abhūvan,
S04bsu016_u:7655: ye tatra jambudvīpe upapannāḥ rājñā sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣeṇa caturbhiḥ saṃgrahavastubhiḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ?
S04bsu016_u:7657: ime te bodhisattvāḥ sarve ihaiva bhagavataḥ parṣanmaṇḍalasamavasṛtā ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau avaivartyāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7659: kecid dvitīyāyāṃ kecitṛtīyāyāṃ keciccaturthyāṃ bhūmau kecitpañcamyāṃ kecitṣaṭhyāṃ kecitsaptamyāṃ kecidaṣṭabhyāṃ kecinnavamyāṃ keciddaśamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7662_0: atha khalu sarvavṛkṣapraphullanasukhasaṃvāsā rātridevatā tasyāṃ velāyāmetameva vipulaprītisaṃbhavanidhānasaṃtuṣṭyavabhāsaṃ
S04bsu016_u:7662_1: bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamānā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:7663: cakṣurmamā jinasutā vipulaṃ yeno vilokayami sarvadiśaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7664: kṣetrodadhīn bahuvidhān vipulān sattvārṇavānapi ca saṃsarataḥ // 71 //
S04bsu016_u:7674: sattvān gatiṣvapi ca saṃsarato buddhān vikurvitagaṇaiśca saha // 76 //
S04bsu016_u:7675: tacca smarāmi khalu lokavidāṃ teṣāṃ yathā prathamakaḥ praṇidhiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7681: yā nirvṛtīparimāṇaguṇā dharmasthiterapi ca yo niyamaḥ // 79 //
S04bsu016_u:7682: ye yānasāgaranayā vimalā ye caiva sattvavinayā vipulāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7685: mama bhāvito vipula kalpaśatānyetaṃ tvamapyavatarāśu nayam // 81 //
S04bsu016_u:7689: iyamihaiva bodhimaṇḍe sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhā nāma rātridevatā bhagavataḥ sakāśamupasaṃkrāntā /
S04bsu016_u:7690: tāmupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau sattvāḥ paripācayitavyāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:7694_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sarvavṛkṣapraphullanasukhasaṃvāsāyā rātridevatāyāḥ
S04bsu016_u:7697: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhā rātridevatā tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7699: sa tāṃ dṛṣṭvā mūrdhnā praṇamya buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān darśananayānanusmaramāṇo 'ntaradharaṇitale praṇipatya suciramatināmayāmāsa //
S04bsu016_u:7700_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ tasmāddharaṇitalādutthāya prāñjalībhūtaḥ sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhāyā
S04bsu016_u:7700_1: rātridevatāyāḥ kāyaṃ nirīkṣamāṇo daśa saṃjñāviśuddhīḥ pratilabhate sma,
S04bsu016_u:7714: yāsāṃ pratilābhāt sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhāyā rātridevatāyā buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamā bodhisattvasabhāgatāḥ pratyalabhata /
S04bsu016_u:7800_0: iti hi sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ prasannacittaḥ sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhāṃ
S04bsu016_u:7800_1: rātridevatāmavalokayan āsāṃ daśānāṃ saṃjñāviśuddhīnāṃ pratilābhādetatpramukhān buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān
S04bsu016_u:7801_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhāyā rātridevatāyā
S04bsu016_u:7802: ekāṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ prāvṛtya yena sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhā rātridevatā,
S04bsu016_u:7803: tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:7804: yathā svacitte vaśitā mamāsti chandaśca bodhau sudṛḍho 'nivartyaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7805: tvadīyacitte 'pi hi me tathaiva svataiva devyadya dṛḍhopajātā // 1 //
S04bsu016_u:7808: cittaṃ guṇaughaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaṃ me pṛthagvidhaiḥ sattvahitapravṛttaiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7810: nidarśitā te khalu sarvadharmān niṣpattirārye madanugrahāya /
S04bsu016_u:7817: puṇyārṇavā me gaganapramāṇāḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ cetasi codbhavanti // 7 //
S04bsu016_u:7820: saṃvardhitaḥ sarvaguṇaiḥ śubhaiśca sarvajñapaṭṭaṃ nacireṇa lapsye // 8 //
S04bsu016_u:7823: sarve yato 'rthāḥ prabhavanti cāsmāt siddhaśca kalyāṇaguṇairupetaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7825: ācāryabhūtā mi guṇāprameye sarvajñadharmeṣu mama praṇetrī /
S04bsu016_u:7826: na kalpakoṭīnayutairasaṃkhyaiḥ śakyaṃ mayā te pratikartumārye // 11 //
S04bsu016_u:7827_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ imā gāthā bhāṣitvā sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhāṃ
S04bsu016_u:7828: vadasva me devate - ko nāmāyaṃ vimokṣaḥ?
S04bsu016_u:7831: evamukte sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhā rātridevatā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - sarvasattvaparipākasaṃcodanakuśalasaṃbhavo nāma kulaputra ayaṃ vimokṣaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7832_0: ahaṃ kulaputra anena vimokṣeṇa samanvāgatā sarvadharmasvabhāvavasamatāmanubuddhya
S04bsu016_u:7832_1: sarvadharmaprakṛtimavatīrya anālayaṃ dharmaṃ niśritya sarvalokoccālitā suvibhaktarūpatāṃ
S04bsu016_u:7832_2: dharmāṇāmavatīrya avisabhāgavarṇā avaivartavarṇā avikalpavarṇā anīlavarṇā apītavarṇā
S04bsu016_u:7832_4: avisabhāgā anānātvā avaimātryā avikalpā anīlā apītā alohitā anavadātavarṇā,
S04bsu016_u:7837_5: ca tathāgatasya anantamadhyāni vikurvitāni saṃdarśayamānā pūrvakāṇi kuśalamūlāni saṃcodayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:7841: praticittakṣaṇaṃ ca anantamadhyaṃ sattvadhātumanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau avivartyabhūmau pratiṣṭhāpayāmi //
S04bsu016_u:7842: yatpunaḥ kulaputra evaṃ vadasi - kiyaccirasaṃprasthitāsi devate anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
S04bsu016_u:7846: na tatra saṃsāradīrghatā vā saṃsārahrasvatā vā prabhāvyate prajñāyate /
S04bsu016_u:7847: kalpasaṃkliṣṭatā vā kalpaviśuddhatā vā kalpaparīttatā vā kalpamahadgatatā vā kalpabahutvaṃ vā kalpanānātvaṃ vā kalpanānākaraṇaṃ vā kalpavimātratā vā prabhāvyate prajñāyate vā /
S04bsu016_u:7849: prakṛtisvabhāvapariśuddhaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ jñānamaṇḍalaṃ sarvasaṃjñājālanirmuktaṃ sarvāvaraṇaparvatasamatikrāntamāśaye udeti /
S04bsu016_u:7851: tadyathā kulaputra sūryamaṇḍale rātriṃdivaṃ saṃkhyā na vidyate,
S04bsu016_u:7854: udāgate ca sūryamaṇḍale divasaḥ prajñāyate prabhāvyate /
S04bsu016_u:7855: evameva kulaputra avikalpe bodhisattvajñānamaṇḍale sarvakalpavikalpaparikalpā na saṃvidyante /
S04bsu016_u:7857: atha ca punarbodhisattvāśayoditā vikalpajñānamaṇḍalaprabhena sarvasattvaparipākakālavaśena kalpasaṃvāsasaṃsārasaṃjñāgatagaṇanāsaṃkhyā prabhāvyate /
S04bsu016_u:7859_0: tadyathā kulaputra sūryamaṇḍalaṃ gaganatalagataṃ sarvaratnaparvateṣu sarvaratnadrumeṣu
S04bsu016_u:7873: na cāsya kalpe dīrghasaṃjñā bhavati na hrasvasaṃjñā /
S04bsu016_u:7877: tadyathā kulaputra mahānadyādiṣu yānapātraṃ satatasamitaṃ sattvasaṃtāraṇāya prayuktamapratiprasrabdhaṃ bhavati,
S04bsu016_u:7878: yāvajjīvaṃ na cāsya apārime tīre 'bhiniveśo bhavati na pārime,
S04bsu016_u:7880: evameva kulaputra bodhisattvo mahāpāramitāyānapātrabalena saṃsāranadīsrotasaḥ sarvasattvasaṃtāraṇāya pratipanno bhavati /
S04bsu016_u:7881: na cāsya apārime tīre utrtrāso bhavati,
S04bsu016_u:7883: atha ca punaḥ satatasamitaṃ sattvasaṃtāraṇāya pratipanno bhavati /
S04bsu016_u:7887: evameva kulaputra bodhisattva āśayajñānagaganatalamaṇḍalaṃ mahāpraṇidhānavātamaṇḍalīparivṛtaṃ sarvadurgatiprapātebhyaḥ sattvān saṃdhārayamāṇaḥ na parikhidyate,
S04bsu016_u:7892: tadyathā kulaputra māyāgatanivṛttasya puruṣasya sarvāṅgapratyaṅgaparipūrṇasya daśa śarīrasthā dharmā na saṃvidyante /
S04bsu016_u:7898: jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaṃ vā pīḍā vā na saṃvidyate /
S04bsu016_u:7901_0: yaduta saṃsārābhilāṣo vā saṃsārabhavagatyupapattinirvedo vā viṣayaratyanunayo vā
S04bsu016_u:7901_1: pratighātacittatā vā upabhoktukāmatā vā sarvakleśaparitāpo vā duḥkhavedanānubhāvo
S04bsu016_u:7901_2: vā viṣayagatyupapattibhayaṃ vā bhavābhilāṣo vā abhiniveśo vā /
S04bsu016_u:7902: api tu khalu kulaputra nirdekṣyāmi buddhānubhāvena anāgatānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ vipulabodhisattvapraṇidhānabalavivardhanatāyai //
S04bsu016_u:7903: bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra atīte 'dhvani lokadhātusamudraparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ pareṇa paratareṇa yadāsīt - tena kālena tena samayena ratnaprabhā nāma lokadhātuḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7904: tasyāṃ khalu punaḥ kulaputra ratnaprabhāyāṃ lokadhātau suprabho nāma kalpo 'bhūt /
S04bsu016_u:7905: tasmin khalu punaḥ suprabhe kalpe daśa buddhasahasrāṇyupapadyante sma /
S04bsu016_u:7906_0: teṣāṃ khalu kulaputra daśānāṃ buddhasahasrāṇāṃ prāthamakalpiko dharmacakranirghoṣagaganapradīparājo
S04bsu016_u:7906_1: nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
S04bsu016_u:7908: sa khalu punaḥ kulaputra tathāgato madhye (Gv 273)
S04bsu016_u:7910: tasyāḥ khalu punā rativyūhāyā rājadhānyāḥ pūrveṇa suprabhaṃ nāma vanaṣaṇḍamabhūt /
S04bsu016_u:7911: tasmin khalu punaḥ suprabhe vanaṣaṇḍe ratnakusumamegho nāma bodhimaṇḍo 'bhūt /
S04bsu016_u:7912: tasmin khalu ratnakusumameghe bodhimaṇḍe vairocanamaṇipadmagarbhasiṃhāsanaṃ prādurabhūt,
S04bsu016_u:7913: yatra sa bhagavān dharmacakranirghoṣagaganameghapradīrājastathāgato niṣadya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7914: tena ca samayena manuṣyāṇāṃ daśa varṣasahasrāṇi āyuḥ pramāṇamabhūt /
S04bsu016_u:7915: atha prāṇātipātiṣu sarveṣu loke prādurbhūteṣu adattādāyiṣu kāmamithyācāriṣu mṛṣāvādiṣu paiśunikeṣu pāruṣikeṣu saṃbhinnapralāpiṣu abhidhyāluṣu vyāpannacitteṣu mithyādṛṣṭiṣu,
S04bsu016_u:7916_0: evaṃ daśasvakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu vipulībhūteṣu supratiṣṭhiteṣu sa bhagavān dharmacakranirghoṣagaganameghapradīparājastathāgataḥ
S04bsu016_u:7916_1: paripūrṇaṃ varṣasahasraṃ bodhimaṇḍagato bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmāsa lokendrāṇāṃ
S04bsu016_u:7916_2: ca pūrvajinakṛtādhikārāṇāṃ jambudvīpakānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ kuśalamūlaparipācanāya //
S04bsu016_u:7917: tena ca samayena tasyāṃ rativyūhāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ jayaprabho nāma rājā abhūt /
S04bsu016_u:7918_0: tena adattādāyināṃ puruṣāṇāṃ caurāṇāṃ kilbiṣakāriṇāṃ prāṇātipātināṃ kāmamithyācāriṇāṃ
S04bsu016_u:7918_1: mṛṣāvādināṃ paiśunikānāṃ pāruṣikāṇāṃ saṃbhinnapralāpināṃ abhidhyālūnāṃ vyāpannacittānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:7919: rājñaḥ khalu punaḥ jayaprabhasya vijitāvī nāma putro 'bhūdabhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyaḥ paramaśubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgato 'ṣṭaviṃśatibhirmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇairupetaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7920: atha sa sarasvatisaṃgītiprāsādābhirūḍho mahāstrīgaṇaparivāraparivṛtaḥ teṣāṃ cārakāvaruddhānāṃ sattvānāṃ vividhagāḍhabandhanabaddhānāṃ bhairavamutkrośaśabdamaśrauṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:7921_0: śrutvā ca punarudvignaḥ saṃvignacitto mahākaruṇāsaṃjātaḥ tasmātprāsādādavatīrya taccārake
S04bsu016_u:7921_4: keśābhicchāditakāyān urunigaḍabandhanabaddhān vividhāḥ kāraṇāḥ kāryamāṇān duḥkhavedanāmanubhavamānānanekavidhān
S04bsu016_u:7922: sa tān dṛṣṭvā mahatkāruṇyamutpādya udārakaruṇāśayasaṃjātaḥ parahitādhāno 'dbhutacetāścārakagahanagatān sattvān samāśvāsayāmāsa bandhanavipramokṣāya /
S04bsu016_u:7923: sa teṣāṃ sattvānāmabhayaṃ datvā yena rājā jayaprabhastenopasaṃkramya evamāhayatkhalu devo jānīyāt - mayā bandhanāgārabandhanagatānāṃ sattvānāṃ kāruṇyādabhayaṃ dattam /
S04bsu016_u:7925: atha jayaprabheṇa rājñā sarvāṇi pañcāmātyaśatāni saṃnipātya paripṛṣṭāniyuṣmākaṃ kathaṃ bhavati?
S04bsu016_u:7926: ta āhuḥ - ete rājakośavilopino rājño vadhāya parākrāntāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7929: vadha evaiṣāṃ daṇḍo bandhanagatānāṃ vā maraṇam /
S04bsu016_u:7933: atha khalu sa vijitāvī rājaputro mahākaruṇāparipīḍitastānamātyān provācatathāstu yathā yūyaṃ vadatha /
S04bsu016_u:7941: atha khalu vijitāvī rājakumārastān sarvān bandhanagatān sattvāṃstasmādbandhanāgārātparimocayati sma ātmaparityāgena sarvaparivāreṇa sarvadhanaskandhena /
S04bsu016_u:7942: sa tān parimocya yatteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhopadhānaṃ tadutsṛjya na vinivartayate sma /
S04bsu016_u:7943: atha tāni pañcāmātyaśatānyūrdhvabāhūni utkrośamānāni jayaprabhaṃ rājānamupasaṃkramya evamāhuḥ - yatkhalu devo jānīyāt - vijitāvinaḥ kumārasya cchandenāyaṃ rājakośo vilupyate /
S04bsu016_u:7945: yadi devo vijitāvino rājakumārasya nigrahaṇaṃ ca kariṣyati,
S04bsu016_u:7947: atha khalu jayaprabho rājā kupito vijitāvinaṃ rājakumāraṃ saha tairaparādhibhiḥ puruṣairvadhāyotsṛṣṭavān /
S04bsu016_u:7948_0: tasya mātā janetrī tacchrutvā udvignā strīsahasraparivṛtā pramuktakeśī nirābharaṇagātrī
S04bsu016_u:7948_1: svamukhaṃ vyālupya urastāḍayantī pāṃśvavakīrṇaśiraskā krandamānā ārtasvaraṃ rudantī
S04bsu016_u:7948_2: rājānamupasaṃkramya saparivārā caraṇayornipatya evaṃ vijñāpayāmāsa - pramuñca deva
S04bsu016_u:7950: atha rājā vijitāvinaṃ kumāraṃ saṃmukhaṃ sthāpayitvā evamāhaṃ - utsṛja kumāra etānaparādhino manuṣyān /
S04bsu016_u:7953: sa vadhamabhyupagatavānasaṃlīnena cittena asaṃkucitena sarvajñatārambaṇaprayuktena parahitapariṇatena mahākaruṇāpūrvaṃgamena /
S04bsu016_u:7954: tasya janetryā rājā jayaprabho 'rdhamāsaṃ yācito darśanāya-ardhamāsaṃ kumāro dānaṃ dadātu yasya yenārthaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7957: atha tasyā rativyūhāyā rājadhānyā uttareṇa pūrvayajñavāṭaprakṛtaṃ sūryaprabhaṃ nāma mahodyānam /
S04bsu016_u:7958: tatra kumāro 'bhiniṣkramya yasya yenārthaḥ tasya tatprādāt /
S04bsu016_u:7959: tena nirargalaṃ yajñaṃ yajatā ardhamāsaṃ vividhā dānavidhayo dattāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7965_0: adrākṣīt sa mahājanakāyo vijitāvī ca rājakumārastaṃ bhagavantaṃ dharmacakranirghoṣagaganameghapradīparājaṃ
S04bsu016_u:7965_1: tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ dūrata evāgacchantaṃ prāsādikaṃ darśanīyaṃ śāntendriyaṃ
S04bsu016_u:7965_2: śāntamānasaṃ guptaṃ jitendriyaṃ nāgamiva sudāntaṃ hradamivācchaṃ viprasannamanāvilaṃ
S04bsu016_u:7965_3: mahatā buddhavikurvitaprātihāryeṇa mahatyā buddhavṛṣabhitayā virocayamānaṃ buddhādhipateyenābhibhavantaṃ
S04bsu016_u:7967_0: atha khalu vijitāvī rājakumāraḥ sa ca mahān janakāyastaṃ bhagavantaṃ dharmacakranirghoṣagaganameghapradīparājaṃ
S04bsu016_u:7967_1: tathāgataṃ dūrādeva pratyudgamya prasannacittaḥ sarvaśarīreṇa praṇipatya pādau śirasābhivandya
S04bsu016_u:7967_2: anekavidhayā pūjayā saṃpūjya evaṃ vācamabhāṣata - ehi bhagavan, ehi sugata /
S04bsu016_u:7970: atha khalu vijitāvī rājakumārastasya bhagavato 'grāsanamupadarśayan evamāha - niṣīdatu bhagavān /
S04bsu016_u:7975: tasya sahadarśanena tasyāṃ parṣadi sarveṣāṃ sattvānāṃ sarvavyādhayaḥ praśāntāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:7977: atha khalu bhagavān dharmacakranirghoṣagaganameghapradīparājastathāgatastān sattvān bhājanabhūtān viditvā anupūrveṇa kathāmakārṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:7980: atha tāvadeva tataḥ parṣado 'śītīnāṃ prāṇiniyutānāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurutpannam /
S04bsu016_u:7984: evaṃ tasya bhagavato mahābuddhavikurvitena dharmacakraṃ pravartayamānasya daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraśatasahasraparamāṇurajaḥsamāḥ sattvā mahāyāne vinayamagaman /
S04bsu016_u:7987: vijitāvī ca rājakumāra imaṃ sarvasattvaparipākayathāśayasaṃcodanakuśalamūlasaṃbhavaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ pratyalabhata //
S04bsu016_u:7988: syātkhalu punaste kulaputra - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena vijitāvī rājakumāro 'bhūt,
S04bsu016_u:7989: yena tatsvakāyajīvitaṃ parityajya sarvadhanaskandhaparivāraṃ parityajya sarvamānuṣyakaṃ ca jīvalokasukhaṃ parityajya te bandhanagatāḥ sattvāḥ tasmādbandhanāt parimokṣitāḥ?
S04bsu016_u:7992: tasya ca tathāgatasya sahadarśanenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam?
S04bsu016_u:7994: na khalu punaste kulaputra evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu016_u:7995: ahaṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena vijitāvī nāma rājakumāro 'bhūvam /
S04bsu016_u:7998: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyāni tāni tena samayena pañcāmātyaśatānyabhūvan,
S04bsu016_u:7999: yaiḥ sa rājā jayaprabho vitathaṃ vijñāpya mama vadhāyodyojitaḥ?
S04bsu016_u:8001: imāni tāni pañca puruṣaśatāni yāni devadattena bhagavato vadhāyodyojitāni /
S04bsu016_u:8002_0: tāni ca bhagavatā vinīya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākṛtāni - bhaviṣyatyanāgate
S04bsu016_u:8002_1: 'dhvani sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamaiḥ kalpaiḥ ekasmin suprabhanāmadheye kalpe pañca buddhaśatāni
S04bsu016_u:8003: yeṣāṃ prāthamakalpiko mahākāruṇiko nāma tathāgato ratnaprabhāyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate /
S04bsu016_u:8004: tasyāmeva lokadhātau dvitīyaḥ sarvajagaddhitapraṇidhānacandro nāma tathāgata utpatsyate /
S04bsu016_u:8009_0: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anye te tena kālena tena samayena aparādhinaḥ puruṣā rājakilbiṣakāriṇo
S04bsu016_u:8009_1: 'bhūvan ye te mayā vadhyaghātavaśagatāḥ svakāyajīvitaṃ parityajya tato bandhanāt parimokṣitāḥ?
S04bsu016_u:8012: tadanyāni ca daśaḥ bodhisattvāsaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrāṇi yairbhagavato 'nantabalavighuṣṭanirnāditaśrīsaṃbhavamatestathāgatasya darśanena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam,
S04bsu016_u:8015: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena jayaprabho nāma rājā abhūt?
S04bsu016_u:8017: satyakaḥ sa mahāvādī tena kālena tena samayena jayaprabho nāma rājā abhūt /
S04bsu016_u:8018: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena rājaparivāro 'bhūdantaḥpurastryāgāradauvārikapārṣadyā vā anuyātrikā vā?
S04bsu016_u:8023: tāni ca sarvāṇi bhagavatā vyākṛtānyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu016_u:8025_0: sa khalu punaḥ kulaputra vijitāvī rājakumāro mātāpitṛbhyāmanujñātastān bandhanagatān
S04bsu016_u:8025_1: sattvān parimocya sphītāṃ vasumatīṃ dhanakanakaratnasamṛddhāmapahāya putradāraṃ cotsṛjya
S04bsu016_u:8039: sa evaṃ dharmasamanvāgataḥ praticittakṣaṇe daśasu dikṣu daśabuddhakṣetrasahasrāṇyākrāmati sma /
S04bsu016_u:8040: ekaikasyāṃ ca lokadhātau cittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe daśa buddhasahasrāṇi pūrvāntāparāntato 'nusmarati sma /
S04bsu016_u:8041: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ daśa buddhanirmāṇasamudrasahasrāṇi daśadikprasṛtānyavataranti sma /
S04bsu016_u:8044: upapadyamānān hīnān praṇītān sugatān durgatān suvarṇān durvarṇān yathākāmopagatān /
S04bsu016_u:8046: cittaparivartān cittacaritāni cintānantaryatāmāśayanānātvamindriyasāgarānapi prayogaprasarānapi karmāvasānamapi paripākavinayakālamapi avatarati sma //
S04bsu016_u:8047: sa khalu punaḥ kulaputra vijitāvī rājakumārastataścyutvā tatraiva jambudvīpe rativyūhāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ tasminneva rājakule upapadya cakravartirājyaiścaryaṃ pratyalabhata /
S04bsu016_u:8048: tena cakravartirājabhūtena tasya bhagavato dharmacakranirghoṣagaganameghapradīparājasya tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasyānantaraṃ dharmagaganābhyudgataśrīrājo nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8049: tasyānantaraṃ tatraiva bodhimaṇḍe śakrabhūtena devendragarbho nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8050: tasyānantaraṃ tatraiva lokadhātau suyāmadevarājabhūtena dharaṇīśrīparvatatejo nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8051: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva lokadhātau saṃtuṣitadevarājabhūtena dharmacakraprabhanirghoṣarājo nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8052: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva lokadhātau sunirmitadevarājabhūtena gaganakāntarājo nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8054: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva lokadhātāvasurendrabhūtena sarvadharmanigarjitarājo nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8055: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva lokadhātau brahmendrabhūtena dharmacakranirmāṇasamantapratibhāsanirghoṣo nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8056: iti hi kulaputra etāṃstathāgatān pramukhān kṛtvā tasyāmeva ratnaprabhāyāṃ lokadhātau tasminneva suprabhe kalpe daśa buddhasahasrāṇyudapadyanta /
S04bsu016_u:8057: sarve ca te tathāgatā vijitāvinā rājakumāreṇārāgitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8058: tasya khalu punaḥ kulaputra suprabhasya mahākalpasyānantaraṃ suraśmirnāma kalpo 'bhūt /
S04bsu016_u:8060: ahaṃ ca tasmin kalpe mahāmatirnāma rājā abhūvam /
S04bsu016_u:8061: tena me rājabhūtena lakṣaṇaśrīparvato nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8062: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva kalpe gṛhapatibhūtena saṃvṛtaskandho nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8063: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva kalpe amātyabhūtena vimalavatso nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8064: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva kalpe 'surendrabhūtena veśadhārī nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8065: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva kalpe vṛkṣadevatābhūtena lakṣaṇasumerurnāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8066: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva kalpe sārthavāhabhūtena vimalabāhurnāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8067: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva kalpe nagaradevatābhūten siṃhavikrāntagāmī nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8068: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva kalpe vaiśravaṇabhūtena devendracūḍo nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8069: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva kalpe gandharvarājabhūtena dharmodgatakīrtināma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8070: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva kalpe kumbhāṇḍendrabhūtena avabhāsamakuṭī nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ //
S04bsu016_u:8071: iti hi kulaputra mayaitān daśa tathāgatān pramukhān kṛtvā tatra suraśmikalpe ṣaṣṭirbuddhakoṭya ārāgitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8072: nānopapattikāyikayā sarve ca me tathāgatāḥ pūjitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8073: ekaikaṃ (Gv 279) ca tathāgatamupasaṃkrāmantyā anantamadhyaḥ sattvadhāturanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripācitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8077: yathā ca tatra suraśmikalpe tathāgatā ārāgitāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:8079: ye 'pi tadanyebhyo lokadhātubhya āgatya tathāgatā dharmaṃ deśayamāsuḥ,
S04bsu016_u:8082: sarve ca mayā te tathāgatā ārāgitā abhirādhitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8083: teṣāṃ ca me buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śāsanaṃ saṃdhāritam /
S04bsu016_u:8084: sarveṣāṃ ca me teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmantikādeṣa sarvasattvaparipākayathāśayasaṃcodanakuśalamūlasaṃbhavo bodhisattvavimokṣaḥ pratilabdho nānāpratilābhanayanānāvimokṣanayamukhaiḥ //
S04bsu016_u:8085: atha khalu sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhā rātridevatā tasyāṃ velāyāmetaṃ vimokṣanayaṃ paridīpayantī saṃdarśayamānā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:8086: acintyametaṃ paramaṃ vimokṣaṃ māṃ pṛcchasi tvaṃ khalu yatprapītaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8089: sarvānatikramya babhūva ramyā ratnaprabhā yā khalu lokadhātuḥ // 13 //
S04bsu016_u:8091: ārāgitāste khalu me munīndrā vimokṣametaṃ paribhāvayantyā // 14 //
S04bsu016_u:8097: vadhāya sṛṣṭāni nṛpeṇa tena tadā sahasrāṇyaparādhināṃ hi /
S04bsu016_u:8098: dṛṣṭvā kumāraḥ kṛpayā parītastān vipramokṣāya nṛpaṃ yayāce // 17 //
S04bsu016_u:8099: śrutvā nṛpo 'mātyagaṇaṃ tadānīmāhūya teṣāṃ nikhilaṃ tadāha /
S04bsu016_u:8100: te procurenaṃ praṇipatya sarve tvaddhātanāyaiṣa nṛpa prayogaḥ // 18 //
S04bsu016_u:8103: śrutvā vadhotsṛṣṭamathāsya mātā sāntaḥpurārtā nṛpatiṃ yayāce /
S04bsu016_u:8104: muñcārdhamāsaṃ nṛpate kumāraṃ dātuṃ pradānānyakhilāni loke // 20 //
S04bsu016_u:8105: dattābhyanujñaśca nṛpeṇa tena prādātsa dānāni yathocitāni /
S04bsu016_u:8107: pāṣaṇḍināṃ yasya yadīpsitaṃ tat tasmai dadāti sma vadhāya sajjaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8108: muktārtanādātha vinirjagāma sā rājadhānyā janatā samagrā // 22 //
S04bsu016_u:8110: pakvāni jñātvā jagadindriyāṇi taṃ yajñavāṭaṃ kṛpayā jagāma // 23 //
S04bsu016_u:8114: anantamadhyāṃ janatāṃ vinīya sa vyākaroti sma tadāgrabodhau /
S04bsu016_u:8116: ārāgya buddhaṃ vipulaṃ ca tasmai vidhāya pūjāṃ mudito babhāṣe /
S04bsu016_u:8117: dvīpo bhaveyaṃ jagatāṃ vinetā trāṇaṃ śaraṇyaśca parāyaṇaṃ ca // 26 //
S04bsu016_u:8118: sa prāvrajattasya muneḥ samīpe saṃbodhimārgaṃ parimārgamāṇaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8119: dharmasvabhāvaṃ suparīkṣamāṇo yatra sthitaḥ kalpaśatāni cīrṇaḥ // 27 //
S04bsu016_u:8121: saṃbodhimārgaṃ paribhāvayitvā labhate tadānīṃ sa vimokṣametam // 28 //
S04bsu016_u:8122: ye tatra kalpe sugatā babhūvurārāgya tānapyakhilān prasannaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8123: pūjāṃ ca teṣāmakarodudārāṃ saṃdhārayāmāsa ca dharmacakram // 29 //
S04bsu016_u:8126: ahaṃ sa āsaṃ vijitāvināmā dṛṣṭvā narāṃścārakabandhanasthān /
S04bsu016_u:8127: tadvipramokṣāya visṛjya dehaṃ labdho mamāyaṃ hi tadā vimokṣaḥ // 31 //
S04bsu016_u:8131: dṛṣṭāśca me kecana ye munīndrāḥ prāptaśca yaṃ me nikhileṣvavāptaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8135: kṣetrāṇi sarvāṇyapi sarvadikṣu spharanti kāyena asajjamānāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8138: vidarśayantyeva ca te jineṣu svakāyameghān pratibimbabhūtāḥ // 36 //
S04bsu016_u:8140: vyūhānaśeṣānabhivarṣamāṇāḥ pūjāṃ prakurvanti ca te jinānām // 37 //
S04bsu016_u:8143: sarvāsvaśeṣāsu ca dikṣu yānti cakṣuṣpathe te jinamaṇḍaleṣu /
S04bsu016_u:8153: yatra pratiṣṭhāya caranti caryāṃ kṣetreṣu sarveṣvaparāntakalpān // 43 //
S04bsu016_u:8159: acchambhi te varṇamahāsamudrān vimokṣametaṃ pratilabhya śāntam // 46 //
S04bsu016_u:8161: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ sarvalokagatisamatikrāntānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sarvalokopapattipratibhāsaprāptānāṃ (Gv 284)
S04bsu016_u:8162_3: sarvavākpathanayasāgarānuprasṛtabuddhīnāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇasamudrān vā avatartuṃ
S04bsu016_u:8162_4: jñānavikramo parijñātuṃ cintāvasthānaṃ vā prajñātuṃ samādhivaśitā vādhigantuṃ vimokṣavikurvitaṃ vā samājñātum //
S04bsu016_u:8164: iyamihaiva jambudvīpe lumbinīvane sutejomaṇḍalaratiśrīrnāma lumbinīvanadevatā prativasati /

S04bsu016_u:8168_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhāyā rātridevatāyāḥ
S04bsu016_u:8171_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhāyā rātridevatāyāstāmanuśāsanīmanusmaran
S04bsu016_u:8172_0: upetya lumbinīvanaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya sutejomaṇḍalaratiśriyaṃ lumbinīvanadevatāṃ parigaveṣamāṇo
S04bsu016_u:8172_3: puraskṛtāṃ dharmaṃ deśayamānāṃ sarvabodhisattvajanmasamudranirdeśaṃ nāma sūtrāntaṃ
S04bsu016_u:8174: upetya sutejomaṇḍalaratiśrīlumbinīvanadevatāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā devate anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
S04bsu016_u:8175: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvā jātā bhavanti tathāgatakule,
S04bsu016_u:8177_1: - daśemāni kulaputra bodhisattvajanmāni yaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā jātā bhavanti tathāgatakuleṣu /
S04bsu016_u:8179: na vitiṣṭhante na viṣīdanti na vivartante na pratiprasrabhyante na parikhidyante na saṃsīdanti na muhyanti nāvalīyante na paritrasyanti na praṇaśyanti /
S04bsu016_u:8202_0: iha kulaputra bodhisattvaḥ ādita eva buddhopasthānāya prapūjyate sarvabuddhān bhagavataḥ

S04bsu016_u:8695: tatra kulaputra avivartyavīryā bodhisattvā etān dharmān pratilabhya akṣayākārābhinirhāreṇa bhāvayanto bahulīkurvantaḥ kalyāṇamitrāṇyārāgya daśabhirākārairabhirādhayanti /

S04bsu016_u:8727_0: atha khalu gopā śākyakanyā imā gāthā bhāṣitvā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat -

S04bsu016_u:8768: yacca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ parinirvāṇaṃ tadapi prajānāmi /
S04bsu016_u:8769: ye ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhisattvaparṣanmaṇḍalasamudrāstānapi prajānāmi /
S04bsu016_u:8794: teṣāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ praticittakṣaṇaṃ nānāsamādhisamudrapratilābhānapi prajānāmi /
S04bsu016_u:8806: yathā ca ahaṃ kulaputra asyāṃ lokadhātau atītavartamānān kalpasamudrān nānāvidhānavatarāmi,
S04bsu016_u:8820: yathā cāsya samantadikprabhāsavairocanasya lokadhātuvaṃśasya daśadigānantaryaparaṃparāvasthitāsu sarvalokadhātuṣu prajānāmi,
S04bsu016_u:8821: evamiha sarvāvati kusumatalagarbhavyūhālaṃkāreṣu lokadhātusumeruṣu lokadhātusamudrāntargateṣu lokadhātuprasareṣu prajānāmi /
S04bsu016_u:8822_0: evaṃ lokadhātunayeṣu lokadhātucakreṣu lokadhātumaṇḍaleṣu lokadhātuvibhāgeṣu lokadhātunadīṣu
S04bsu016_u:8823: yathā ca asmin kusumatalagarbhavyūhālaṃkāre lokadhātusamudre prajānāmi,
S04bsu016_u:8824: evaṃ daśasu dikṣu anantaparyanteṣu dharmadhātuparameṣu ākāśadhātuparyavasāneṣu sarvalokadhātusamudreṣu vairocanasya pūrvapraṇidhānasāgarān prajānāmi avatarāmi anusmarāmi /
S04bsu016_u:8856: ye ca bhagavatā purvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā sattvasamudrāḥ paripācitāstānapyavatarāmi /
S04bsu016_u:8866: yathā ca bhagavato vairocanasya sarvasmin dharmadhātau bodhisattvacaritasamudrānapyavatarāmi prajānāmi abhinirharāmi,
S04bsu016_u:8867: evaṃ sarvatathāgatānāṃ daśasu dikṣu dharmadhātuparameṣvākāśadhātuparyavasāneṣu sarvalokadhātusamudreṣvasaṃbhinnasarvabodhisattvacaritasamudrānapyavatarāmi prajānāmi abhinirharāmi /
S04bsu016_u:8870: eṣa hi kulaputra asya sarvabodhisattvasamādhinayasāgaravyavalokanaviṣayasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya viṣayaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:8882: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako gopāṃ śākyakanyāmetadavocat - kiyaccirapratilabdhastvayāyamārye bodhisattvasamādhinayasāgaravyavalokanaviṣayo bodhisattvavimokṣaḥ?
S04bsu016_u:8883: āha - bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra atīte 'dhvani buddhakṣetraśataparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ pareṇa abhayaṃkarā nāma lokadhāturabhūt /
S04bsu016_u:8884: tasyāṃ khalu lokadhātau gatipravaro nāma kalpo 'bhūt /
S04bsu016_u:8885: tasyāḥ khalu punarlokadhātormadhye kṣemāvatī nāma cāturdvīpikā abhūt /
S04bsu016_u:8886: tasyāṃ khalu cāturdvīpikāyāṃ madhye jambudvīpasya drumameruśrīrnāma rājadhānyabhūccaturaśīternagarakoṭīsahasrāṇāṃ pramukhā /
S04bsu016_u:8889: teṣāṃ khalu punarmahānagarāṇāṃ sarvaratnavṛkṣahemajālālaṃkārādibhyo vātasaṃghaṭṭitebhyo bahutūryanirghoṣasamarutaniścaritebhyo 'yamevaṃrūpa ānandaśabdo niścarati sma - snāta,
S04bsu016_u:8896: tasyāṃ khalu drumameruśriyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ dhanapatirnāma rājā abhūt maṇḍalikaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8899_0: rājñaḥ khalu punardhanapateḥ pañca putraśatānyabhūvan sarveṣāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ
S04bsu016_u:8900: rājñaḥ khalu punardhanapateḥ padmaśrīgarbhasaṃbhavā nāma agramahiṣī abhūt teṣāṃ caturaśīteḥ strīsahasrāṇāṃ pramukhā /
S04bsu016_u:8907: pādatalayoścāsya cakrāṇi jātāni sahasrārāṇi sanābhīni sanemikāni sarvākāraparipūrṇāni surucirāṇi darśanīyāni /
S04bsu016_u:8910: ubhe cāsya hastapādatale jālinī abhūtāṃ vicitrasuvibhaktācchidrāparisrāviṇī,
S04bsu016_u:8918: sa tairyān spṛśati striyaṃ vā puruṣaṃ vā dārakaṃ vā dārikāṃ vā,
S04bsu016_u:8921: tasya jaṅghe anupurvasamudgate abhūtāṃ racite vṛtte sujāte eṇeyasyeva mṛgarajñaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8925: tasya dvayoḥ pādayordvāvutsadau jātāvabhūtāṃ vṛttau sujātau suparipūrṇāvadṛśyasaṃdhī suracitau darśanīyau,
S04bsu016_u:8930: nāsya kaścitstrī vā puruṣo vā dārako vā dārikā vā vṛddho vā madhyo vā daharo vā gururvā gurusthānīyo vā nirvasanasyāpyapaśyadanyatra svaparibhogena naimittikena vā kāmopacitena /
S04bsu016_u:8934: khalu punarabhavat sūpacitaśarīraḥ suvibhaktasamucchrayaḥ sarvakāyasamabhāgapratiṣṭhitaḥ anūnagātraḥ anunnatagātro 'pariṇatagātro maṇiphalakavisṛṣṭātirekadyutigātraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8940: vṛhadṛjugātramahāpuruṣalakṣaṇapratilabdhaḥ sa khalu punarabhavat sarvāvaropetaparamāṇusamagātraḥ praśamagātro gurugātraḥ prasannagātraḥ prahlādagātraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8942: tasya yāvatyo grīvāsāmantakena mukhasāmantakena ca rasaharaṇyaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:8943: tāḥ sarvāḥ samā abhūvan samantāḥ suparipūrṇāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8947: tasya kiṃcidbhaktaparibhogeṣu ekavāramapi mukhabhaktaṃ parivartamānamasaṃbhinnamabhyavahāramagamat antaśa ekodanabindurapi /
S04bsu016_u:8949: aviralā aviṣamā asya dantā abhūvan acchidrasaṃdhayaḥ samāṃ suvibhaktāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:8951: vā upakledo vā abhiṣyando vā paryavanāho vā atisarjanaṃ vā /
S04bsu016_u:8952_0: samadantatāmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇapratilabdhaḥ khalu punarabhavat samadanto nonadanto nādhikadanto
S04bsu016_u:8952_1: nonnatadanto na saṃnatadanto na saṃbhinnadantaḥ samantamadhyadanto 'nutsannadanto
S04bsu016_u:8953: suśukladaṃṣṭraśca kumāro 'bhūt nirupakleśadaṣṭraḥ suprasannadaṃṣṭraḥ supariśuddhadaṃṣṭraḥ susaṃsthitavicitradaṃṣṭraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8955: (Gv 311) prabhūtā cāsya jihvā abhūt tanvī mṛdvī sukumārā karmaṇyā kamanīyā laghuparivartinī mukhamaṇḍalasaṃchādanī tathyapathyārthavyañjanapadaniruktyadhiṣṭhānasaṃprayuktā /
S04bsu016_u:8960: abhinīlanetraśca sa kumāro 'bhūdacchanetraḥ pariśuddhanetraḥ prabhāsvaranetraḥ viprasannanetro 'bhirūpanetro
S04bsu016_u:8962: gopakṣmo sa kumāro 'bhūtpadmarāgasuviśuddhacakṣurāyatanaḥ samanetraraṅgaḥ samasadṛśanetraraṅgaḥ sujātanetraraṅgaḥ āyatanetraraṅgaḥ paripūrṇanetraraṅgaḥ supratiṣṭhitanetraraṅgaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8963: bhruvontare cāsya ūrṇā jātābhūnmṛdvī karmaṇyā sukumārākulasaṃsparśā svacchā śuddhā prabhāsvarā himaguḍikātuṣāravarṇā suśuklaraśmimaṇḍalaprabhāvabhāsā /
S04bsu016_u:8964_0: murdhni ca asyoṣṇīṣamabhinirvṛttamabhūt sujātaṃ samantaparimaṇḍalaṃ madhyābhinyastakeśālaṃkāraṃ
S04bsu016_u:8966: nāsya kāye rajo vā malo vā kledo vā jālaṃ vā valī vā śaithilyaṃ vā bhaṅgo vā prasaraṇaṃ vā visaraṇaṃ vā asamaṃ vā asthiṣata /
S04bsu016_u:8969: ekaikaromasya ekaikasmin romakūpe roma jātamabhūnnīlavaiḍūryavarṇapradakṣiṇāvartakuṇḍalajātaṃ suparisaṃcitaṃ suniviṣṭaṃ supratiṣṭhitam /
S04bsu016_u:8970: ūrdhvāṅgaromā ca sa kumāro 'bhūdavinivartanīyaromā apratyudāvartanīyaromā asaṃsṛṣṭaromā /
S04bsu016_u:8973_0: tasya nīlāḥ keśā abhūvan vairocanamaṇiratnanīlavarṇanirbhāsāḥ snigdhā mṛdavaḥ sukuñcitāḥ
S04bsu016_u:8973_1: pradakṣiṇāvartakuṇḍalinaḥ sujātamūlā anuddhatāḥ niṣpīḍitā asaṃlulitāḥ samasadṛśasthānasaṃsthitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8974: nyagrodhaparimaṇḍalatāmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇapratilabdhaḥ sa khalu punaḥ tejodhipatī rājakumāro 'bhūt samantabhadraparimaṇḍalaḥ samantabhadraḥ samantaprāsādikaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8976: pṛṣṭhato 'pi dakṣiṇato 'pi vāmato 'pi gacchannapi tiṣṭhannapi niṣaṇṇo 'pi bhāṣamāṇo 'pi tūṣṇībhūto 'pi atṛptikaramanāpacārudarśano 'bhut /
S04bsu016_u:8977_0: ebhiḥ kulaputra dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtakāyaḥ sa tejodhipatī rājakumāro
S04bsu016_u:8978: sa khalu kulaputra tejodhipatī rājakumāro 'pareṇa samayena pitrābhyanujñāto drumameruśriyo rājadhānyā gandhāṅkuraprabhameghaṃ nāmodyānam,
S04bsu016_u:8979_0: tatra bhūmidarśanāya abhiniryayau viṃśatyā kanyāsahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ mahatā puṇyatejautaḥśrīsaubhāgyavikurvitavyūhena
S04bsu016_u:8981_0: tasya tathā vrajato 'ṣṭavartmā mārgaḥ samavasthiṣata nimnonnatavigato 'pagataśarkarakaṭhallotsado
S04bsu016_u:8983: tatra keṣucidratnavyomakeṣu vividharatnaparipūrṇāni ratnabhājanāni sthāpitānyabhūvan yācanakasaṃghapratipādanakārtham /
S04bsu016_u:8991: keṣucidvyomakeṣu sarvākāravividhadivyamanojñavarṇagandhāḥ sarvagandhavidhayaḥ sthāpitā abhuvan vilepanārthināṃ yathābhiprāyaparibhogārtham /
S04bsu016_u:8992: keṣucidvyomakeṣu sarvopakaraṇarāśayaḥ sthāpitā abhūvan sattvānāṃ yathāśayābhiprāyaparibhogārtham /
S04bsu016_u:8993_0: keṣucidvyomakeṣu nāryo 'bhirūpāḥ prāsādikā darśanīyā vividhacārurūpaveśā vicitramanojñavastrasaṃdhitāḥ
S04bsu016_u:8994: tena khalu punaḥ samayena tasyāmeva drumameruśriyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ sudarśanā nāma agragaṇikābhūdrājaparibhogyā /
S04bsu016_u:8995_0: tasyāḥ sucalitaratiprabhāsaśrīrnāma dārikābhūdabhirūpā prāsādikā darśanīyā nātidīrghā
S04bsu016_u:8995_1: nātihrasvā nātisthūlā nātikṛśā nātigaurā nātiśyāmā abhinīlanetrā abhinīlakeśī abhirāmavaktrā
S04bsu016_u:8995_2: brahmasvarā madhurapriyavādinī prājñā sarvakalāvidhijñā sarvaśāstrakovidā dakṣā analasā
S04bsu016_u:8995_3: sagauravā saprasādā maitracittā apratighātabahulā atṛptikaramanāpadarśanā mandarāgadoṣamohā
S04bsu016_u:8995_4: hryapatrāpyasaṃpannā mārdavā ṛjvī aśāṭyā amāyā (Gv 313) vinītā /
S04bsu016_u:8996_0: sā mātrā sārdhamanekakanyāparivṛtā ratnarathābhirūḍhā drumameruśriyo rājadhānyā niṣkramya
S04bsu016_u:8996_1: tejodhipate rājakumārasya purataḥ tejodhipatiṃ rājakumāraṃ parimārgayamāṇā rājājñāniyogādgacchantī
S04bsu016_u:8997_1: mātaraṃ sudarśanāmetadavocat - yatkhalu amba jānīyāḥ - sacenmāṃ tejodhipate rājakumārasya na dāsyasi,
S04bsu016_u:9004: api tu khalu punardārike gaṇikā vayaṃ sarvalokaratikarāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:9006: vayaṃ hi rājño dhanapaterājñayā tejodhipateḥ kumārasyopasthānāya niryātāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:9009_0: tena ceha samayena sūryagātrapravaro nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi
S04bsu016_u:9009_1: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu016_u:9011: tatra sa bhagavān sūryagātrapravarastathāgataḥ prathamasaptāhābhisaṃbuddho vyāhārṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:9012: sa tayā dārikayā rathābhirūḍhayaiva pracalāyamānayā svapnāntare dṛṣṭaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:9013_0: prativibuddhāyāśca purāṇajñātisālohitayā devatayā ārocitam - eṣa dārike sūryagātrapravarastathāgato
S04bsu016_u:9015_0: ākāśadevatā abdevatā jvalanadevatā vāyudevatāḥ sāgaradevatāḥ nadīdevatā parvatadevatā
S04bsu016_u:9015_1: rātridevatā aruṇodgatadevatā vanadevatā vṛkṣadevatā auṣadhidevatāḥ sasyadevatā nagaradevatāḥ
S04bsu016_u:9015_3: sarvadigdevatāśca saṃnipatitāḥ tasya bhagavataḥ sūryagātrapravarasya tathāgatasya darśanāyeti //
S04bsu016_u:9016: sā tena tathāgatadarśanena tathāgataguṇaśravaṇena ca viśāradā bhūtvā avakāśapratilabdhā tejodhipate rājakumārasya puratastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:9017: rūpavareṇahu loki viśiṣṭā viśruta sarvadiśāsu guṇebhiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:9020: prāṇaśatā bahu naikasahasrā ye mama prekṣiṣu rāgavaśena /
S04bsu016_u:9021: nāpi ca rajyati mahya kumārā kasyacidantiki mānasu loke // 2 //
S04bsu016_u:9022: no ca mama pratihanyati cittaṃ nāpyanunīyati kutraci sattve /
S04bsu016_u:9023: nāpi ca me kvaci vairu na doṣaḥ sarvahite 'bhirataṃ mama cittam // 3 //
S04bsu016_u:9024: yada mi tvamapi dṛṣṭa kumāro rūpabalapravaro guṇadhārī /
S04bsu016_u:9025: tada indriya prīṇita sarve prīta mamo vipulā upajātā // 4 //
S04bsu016_u:9027: subhrulalāṭa sunāsā eṣa nivedayamī tava ātmā // 5 //
S04bsu016_u:9029: purato na virājami tubhyaṃ śyāmakṛtā maṣivigrahatulyā // 6 //
S04bsu016_u:9032: na ca te pratihanyati vācyaṃ agraruta pratigṛhṇami mahyam // 7 //
S04bsu016_u:9033: vadane tava jihva prabhūtā tāmratanū vipulā ratanābhā /
S04bsu016_u:9035: vadane sahitāstava dantā śaṅkhanibhā vimalā suvibhaktā /
S04bsu016_u:9037: smitu yehi vidarśayamānaḥ toṣayase janatāṃ naravīra // 9 //
S04bsu016_u:9038: tava lakṣaṇaśobhana kāyastriṃśa duveva prabhāsura śuddhaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:9039: samalaṃkṛtu yehi surūpaḥ cakradharo bhavitāsi narendrā // 10 //
S04bsu016_u:9040: atha khalu tejodhipatī rājaputraḥ sucalitaratiprabhāsaśriyaṃ dārikāmetadavocat - kasya tvaṃ dārike,
S04bsu016_u:9042: na mama dārike kalpate paraparigṛhīteṣu dāreṣu mamatāṃ kartum /
S04bsu016_u:9045: pṛcchāmi te brūhi mamaitamarthaṃ parigrahastvaṃ varagātri kasya // 11 //
S04bsu016_u:9046: mātā pitā vā tava kaccidasti bhartāpi vā svāmi parigraho vā /
S04bsu016_u:9047: sattvo 'pi cānyaḥ khalu yena saṃjñā kṛtā mameti tvayi saumyarūpe // 12 //
S04bsu016_u:9048: kaccinna hiṃsābhirataṃ manaste harasyadattaṃ khalu mā pareṣām /
S04bsu016_u:9049: mā kāmamithyācaraṇe ratiste mā vā mṛṣādya prasṛtaṃ manaste // 13 //
S04bsu016_u:9050: mā mitrabhedaprasṛtā matiste mā marmabhedīni vacāṃsi vakṣi /
S04bsu016_u:9051: mā te 'parakṣeṣu dhaneṣvabhidhyā vyāpādacittaṃ janatāsu cāpi // 14 //
S04bsu016_u:9052: mā dṛṣṭikāntārapathi sthitāsi mā karmavaṃśoddhuracetanā vā /
S04bsu016_u:9053: māyāvinī śāṭhyavaśānugā vā mā bādhase tvaṃ viṣameṇa lokam // 15 //
S04bsu016_u:9056: daridrabhūteṣu ca saṃgrahāya kaccitpradātuṃ prasṛtaṃ manaste // 16 //
S04bsu016_u:9057: premāsti kalyāṇasuhṛtsvatho vā dharmeṇa kāle ca vadanti ye tvām /
S04bsu016_u:9058: kāyasya cittasya ca kalyatāṃ te karmaṇyatāṃ vā janayanti samyak // 17 //
S04bsu016_u:9059: buddheṣu te gauravamasti kaccit premāpi vā buddhasuteṣu tīvram /
S04bsu016_u:9061: kaccitpare tiṣṭhasi dharmavaṃśe na cāpyadharmaṃ carituṃ matiste /
S04bsu016_u:9062: anantavarṇe ca guṇārṇave te kaccitparaṃ prema ca gauravaṃ ca // 19 //
S04bsu016_u:9064: āpāyike karmaṇi ca pravṛttā kaccidbhṛśārtā karuṇāyase tvam // 20 //
S04bsu016_u:9065: pareṣu saṃpattimudīkṣya cāgrāṃ kaccitparāṃ tuṣṭimupaiṣi ca tvam /
S04bsu016_u:9068: kalpānanantān caramāṇa caryāṃ kaccinna te prārthanayāsti khedaḥ // 22 //
S04bsu016_u:9069_0: atha khalu sudarśanā agragaṇikā sucalitaratiprabhāsaśriyo dārikāyā mātā tejodhipatiṃ
S04bsu016_u:9069_1: rājakumārametadavocat - mamaiṣā kumāra dārikā upapādukā padmagarbhasaṃbhūtā nābhiniṣkrāntapūrvā gṛhāt /
S04bsu016_u:9071: māṃ bhāṣamāṇāṃ śṛṇu rājaputra yaddārikā te paripṛcchateyam /
S04bsu016_u:9072: vakṣye 'nupūrvyā tava dārikeyaṃ jātā yathā saumya vivardhitā ca // 23 //
S04bsu016_u:9074: niśākṣaye yatra bhavān prasūtaḥ tatraiva jātā mama dārikeyam /
S04bsu016_u:9077: sālaprabhodyānavare madīye ciraṃ mayā tatra vinirgatāham // 25 //
S04bsu016_u:9081: vicitraratnāmbaradhāriṇībhiḥ gīte ca vādye ca suśikṣitābhiḥ // 27 //
S04bsu016_u:9087: āsaṃstadā saṃśayitā janaughā rātryāṃ kimabhyudgata eṣa sūryaḥ // 30 //
S04bsu016_u:9092: na karmaṇo hyasti kṛtasya nāśaḥ pūrve sucīrṇasya vipāka eṣaḥ // 32 //
S04bsu016_u:9098: rutaṃ ca divyaṃ madhuraṃ ruvatyā gandho mukhādvāti yathotpalasya // 35 //

S04bsu016_u:9348_0: ya etarhi pūrvasyāṃ diśi lokadhātau sāgaraparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ lokadhātusamudrāṇāṃ
S04bsu016_u:9350: tena ca bhagavatā ratnakusumaprabheṇa tathāgatena pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā sarvadharmadhātugaganapratibhāsamegho lokadhātusamudraḥ pariśodhitaḥ /

S04bsu016_u:9353: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena padmaśrīgarbhasaṃbhavā nāma rājabhāryā abhūt tejodhipateḥ kumārasya mātā caturaśītistrīsahasrāṇāṃ pramukhānām?

S04bsu016_u:9355_2: tena kālena tena samayena padmaśrīgarbhasaṃbhavā nāma rājño dhanateragramahiṣyabhūt /

S04bsu016_u:9361: ahaṃ sā tena kālena tena samayena sucalitaratiprabhāsaśrīrgaṇikādārikā abhūt /
S04bsu016_u:9362: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena tejodhipate rājñaḥ parivāro 'bhūt?
S04bsu016_u:9365: sa khalu kulaputra sūryagātrapravarastathāgatastejodhipatinā cakravartinā ca mayā ca yāvajjīvamupasthito 'bhūt cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ //
S04bsu016_u:9366: tasya khalu punaḥ kulaputra sūryagātrapravarasya tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasyānantaraṃ tasyāmeva lokadhātau prasannagātro nāma tathāgato loka udapādi /
S04bsu016_u:9368: tasyānantaraṃ sarvagātrajñānapratibhāsacandro nāma tathāgato loka udapādi /

S04bsu016_u:9421: abhūvan, yānyasmābhirārāgitāni satkṛtāni gurukṛtāni mānitāni pūjitāni cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ //
S04bsu016_u:9422: teṣāṃ khalu kulaputra ṣaṣṭerbuddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ sarvapaścimo vipuladharmādhimuktisaṃbhavatejo nāma tathāgata utpanno 'bhūt /
S04bsu016_u:9423_0: tasya bhagavato nagare praviṣṭasya mayā rājabhāryābhūtayā sārdhaṃ svāminā sarvākārapūjāmukhaṃ
S04bsu016_u:9423_1: prayuktayā tathāgatapūjayā pūjāṃ kṛtvā sarvatathāgatotpattisaṃbhavapradīpo nāma tathāgatadharmaparyāyastasya
S04bsu016_u:9426: sā khalvahaṃ kulaputra etaṃ vimokṣaṃ bhāvayamānā buddhakṣetraśataparamāṇurajaḥsamān kalpānāgatān bodhisattvena sārdhaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caramāṇā /

S04bsu016_u:9434: ye khalu punaḥ kulaputra sattvā bodhisattvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ carantaṃ dṛṣṭvā bodhisattvasyāntike 'nunayacittamutpādayāmāsuḥ,
S04bsu016_u:9436: sarve te bodhisattvena laukikalokottarairvividhairupāyaiḥ saṃgṛhītā bodhisattvasya parivārā bhavanti sma /

S04bsu016_u:9446: ākāśatalapraveśāpramāṇā hi kulaputra samantabhadrāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ vimokṣanayāḥ sarvasattvasaṃjñāgatatalāpramāṇāḥ tryadhvaparivartasāgaratalāpramāṇā (Gv 333)
S04bsu016_u:9448: tathāgataviṣayasamaśarīrā hi kulaputra samantabhadrāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ vimokṣanayāḥ //
S04bsu016_u:9449: sā ahaṃ kulaputra buddhakṣetraparmāṇurajaḥsamān kalpān bodhisattvaśarīraṃ prekṣamāṇā atṛptaiva darśanena /

S04bsu016_u:9451_0: evameva kulaputra mama bodhisattvasya śarīraṃ prekṣamāṇāyā ekaikasmādromavivarādanantamadhyāpramāṇanirdeśā
S04bsu016_u:9453: nānābodhimaṇḍālaṃkārā nānādharmacakrapravartanavikurvitā nānāsūtrāntanirghoṣavikurvitāḥ apratisrabdhayogena praticittakṣaṇaṃ cakṣuṣa ābhāsamāgacchanti /
