S04bsu016_u:9474: ihaiva bhagavato vairocanasya pādamūle vividharatnavyūhamahāmaṇirājapadmagarbhāsananiṣaṇṇā bodhisattvajanetrī māyā nāma devī /

S04bsu016_u:9485: atha khalu gopā śākyakanyā etameva vimokṣamukhanayaṃ saṃdarśayantī buddhādhiṣṭhānena tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -

S04bsu016_u:9559_3: darśanamārāgayituṃ saṃmukhībhāvatāmanuprāptuṃ samavadhānaṃ cāptuṃ nimittaṃ codgrahītuṃ

S04bsu016_u:9599: atha tāvadeva virajaḥprabhāsaṃ nāma cakṣuḥ pratilebhe,
S04bsu016_u:9622_0: atha khalu sunetro nāma rākṣasendro bodhisattvasaṃgītiprāsādadvārapālo daśānāṃ rākṣasasahasrāṇāṃ

S04bsu016_u:9622_2: kusumairabhyavakīrya evamāha - daśabhiḥ kulaputra dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattva

S04bsu016_u:9659_0: āha - tena hi kulaputra samantadikpraṇipatitena śarīreṇa sarvārambaṇena kalyāṇamitrasmṛtyupanibaddhenāśayena

S04bsu016_u:9661_0: tasyāṃ ca mahāratnarājapadmakarkaṭikāyāṃ dharmadhātudiksamavasaraṇagarbhaṃ nāma kūṭāgāramapaśyaccitraṃ
S04bsu016_u:9703: ityevaṃprakāreṇa rūpeṇa sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako māyādevīmadrākṣīdarūpeṇa rūpapratibhāsena avedanena rūpeṇa lokaduḥkhavedanāpraśāntiparameṇa,
S04bsu016_u:9712_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sarvajagadrūpasaṃjñāpagataḥ parasattvāśayānavataran
S04bsu016_u:9715: sa tāṃ dṛṣṭvā yatpramāṇā māyādevī tatpramāṇaṃ svakāyamadhiṣṭhāya samantadigabhimukhāṃ māyādevīṃ sarvatrānugatena kāyena praṇipatitaḥ /

S04bsu016_u:9734: yaduta bodhimaṇḍavarāgragatā buddhasiṃhāsananiṣaṇṇā bodhisattvaparṣanmaṇḍalaparivṛtā lokendrābhipūjitā dharmacakraṃ pravartayamānāḥ /

S04bsu016_u:10102: (Gv 361) sarvatrānugatāṃ ca bodhisattvopapattivaśitāṃ prabhāvayan sarvasattvajanmasaṃdarśanābhimukhatayā ca sattvaparipākāriñcanatāyai /
S04bsu016_u:10106: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryā paripraṣṭavyā,
S04bsu016_u:10119: sa hi kulaputra maitreyo bodhisattvo 'vatīrṇaḥ sarvabodhisattvacaryāsu gatiṃgataḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10130: sa te kulaputra kalyāṇamitro 'bhiṣyandayiṣyati sarvakuśalamūlāni vivardhayiṣyati /
S04bsu016_u:10139: na ca te kulaputra ekakuśalamūlatanmayena bhavitavyaṃ naikadharmamukhālokāvabhāsaparameṇa naikacaryāparisaṃtuṣṭena naikapraṇidhānābhinirhāraparameṇa naikavyākaraṇena,
S04bsu016_u:10147: apramāṇāni hi kulaputra bodhisattvena kuśalamūlāni samudānetavyāni /
S04bsu016_u:10247: saṃkṣiptena kulaputra sarvasattvasamoktā bodhisattvānāṃ caryā sattvaparipācanatayā /
S04bsu016_u:10257: tasmāttarhi kulaputra na te parikheda utpādayitavyaḥ kalyāṇamitraparimārgaṇāsu /
S04bsu016_u:10305: kalyāṇamitrasaṃdhāritāḥ kulaputra bodhisattvā na patanti durgatiṣu /
S04bsu016_u:10360: api ca kulaputra mātṛbhūtāni kalyāṇamitrāṇi buddhakuleṣu janayitrīṇi /
S04bsu016_u:10370: tasmāttarhi kulaputra evaṃ manasikārāt pratiprasrabdhena kalyāṇamitrāṇyupasaṃkramitavyāni pṛthivīsamacittena sarvabhāravahanāpariṇamanatayā /
S04bsu016_u:10435: evaṃ kalyāṇamitrādhyāśayapariśuddhā hi kulaputra bodhisattvāḥ kalyāṇamitrājñāsu pratipadyamānā vivardhante sarvakuśalamūlaiḥ himavatsaṃniśritā iva tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatayaḥ /

S04bsu016_u:10519: / ye te sarvakṣetrāniśritāśca sarvakṣetreṣu ca anuvicaranti tathāgatapūjākarmaṇe /

S04bsu016_u:10600: sarveṣa yo jinasutāna mahāyaśānāṃ mahājñānagocara vimokṣapratiṣṭhitānām /
S04bsu016_u:10601: ye dharmadhātu vicaranti asajjamānā āvāsu teṣamayamapratipudgalānām // 2 //
S04bsu016_u:10607: na karonti niśrayu kvacidgagane va pakṣī teṣāṃ vihāru ayu jñānaviśāradānām // 5 //
S04bsu016_u:10608: ye rāgadoṣamatha mohasvabhāva jñātvā saṃkalpahetujanitāṃ vitathapravṛttim /
S04bsu016_u:10609: nirvikalpayanti ca virāgamayīha teṣāṃ śāntapraśāntyumagatānamayaṃ vihāraḥ // 6 //
S04bsu016_u:10611: praparīkṣamāṇa na patanti vidū praśāntiprajñāupāyakuśalānamayaṃ vihāraḥ // 7 //

S04bsu016_u:10618: maitraprabhāya śamayanti apāya sarvān āvāsu teṣamaya maitrakṛpāśayānām // 10 //
S04bsu016_u:10620: ye prekṣya lokamiha mokṣapathe praṇenti sārthātivāhasadṛśānamayaṃ vihāraḥ // 11 //
S04bsu016_u:10625: parimocayanti vipulāṃ karuṇāṃ janitvā mahavaidyarājadṛśānamayaṃ vihāraḥ // 13 //
S04bsu016_u:10626: ye te niśāmya janatāṃ dukhitāmatrāṇāṃ śokākare patita mṛtyusamudragāmi /
S04bsu016_u:10627: tārenti kṛva mahatīṃ śubhadharmanāvaṃ teṣāṃ vihāramaya dāśasutopamānām // 14 //
S04bsu016_u:10636: yatha eki sattvi tatha sarvajagatyaśeṣam āvāsu teṣamaya lokaparāyaṇānām // 18 //
S04bsu016_u:10637: ye ekakṣetraprasare aparāntakalpān vicaranti cārika jagārthamakhinnavīryāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10638: yatha ekakṣetri tatha sarvadaśaddiśāsu āvāsu teṣamaya vajradṛḍhāśayānām // 19 //
S04bsu016_u:10639: ye dharmamegha sugatāna daśaddiśāsu ekāsane sthita pibanti asaṃpramūḍhāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10641: ye kṣetrasāgara vrajanti anābhilāpyān praviśanti co pariṣasāgara nāyakānām /
S04bsu016_u:10642: ye pūjasāgara vicitra jine karonti teṣāmasaṅgacaraṇānamayaṃ vihāraḥ // 21 //
S04bsu016_u:10644: bahukalpasāgara caranti jagaddhitārthā teṣāṃ vihāru ayu sarvaguṇākarāṇām // 22 //
S04bsu016_u:10645: ye eki vālapathi uttaramāna kṣetrāt buddhāṃśca sattva tatha kalpa anantamadhyān /
S04bsu016_u:10646: praviśanti enta na punā ca upenti sīmāṃ teṣāmasaṅganayanānamayaṃ vihāraḥ // 23 //
S04bsu016_u:10647: ye ekacittakṣaṇi kalpamahāsamudrān praviśanti kṣetra tatha buddhajagatpracārān /
S04bsu016_u:10650: ye sarvakṣetraparamāṇurajān gaṇitvā bindupramāṇa tulayitva jalaugha sarvam /
S04bsu016_u:10653: abhinirharanti vicaranti anantakalpān iha te praviṣṭa sugatāna sutāḥ smṛtīmāḥ // 26 //
S04bsu016_u:10654: iha te sthitā jinasutā vividhā vicitrā abhinirharanti bahuśāstrakathārthayuktāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10655: saukhyāvahāni jagatāmiha śilpasthānānyanucintayanta viharanti satāṃ vihāraḥ // 27 //
S04bsu016_u:10656: iha te sthitā mahaabhijñaupāyajñāne yāvanta sattvagatibheda daśaddiśāsu /
S04bsu016_u:10657: sarvatra janmacyutibheda vidarśayanti māyāgate sthita vimokṣa asaṅgacaryāḥ // 28 //
S04bsu016_u:10658: iha te sthitā prathamacittasamudbhavādyāṃ darśenti dharmacaryāṃ vasudharmaniṣṭhām /
S04bsu016_u:10660: ye ekacittaprasareṇa vibuddha bodhiṃ praviśanti jñānamatikarma anantamadhyā /
S04bsu016_u:10661: saṃmohaketvavraji loku ya cintayāna evaṃ durāsadagatānamayaṃ vihāraḥ // 30 //
S04bsu016_u:10668: iha te kṛpāśayamatī sthitvā jagadīkṣya duḥkhaśokahatam /
S04bsu016_u:10673: iha te sthitā jinasutāḥ sarvajinānāṃ ca pādamūleṣu /
S04bsu016_u:10677: iha te praviṣṭa śūrāḥ sarvaṃ jinagocaraṃ tulayamānā /
S04bsu016_u:10691: iha sarvakṣetrasaṃkhyāṃ kalpānāṃ caiva dharmasaṃkhyāṃ ca /
S04bsu016_u:10693: iha te sthitā jinasutā yāvat kṣetrāstriyadhvasaṃkhyātāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10695: iha te sthitā jinānāṃ caryāṃ praṇidhiṃ ca indriyaṃ jagatām /
S04bsu016_u:10704: sthitveha sattvasamatāṃ dharmeṣu buddhasamatāṃ ca prekṣya /
S04bsu016_u:10707: vimṛṣantyapare dharmāniha te bhavanavare sthitā dhīrāḥ // 52 //

S04bsu016_u:10744: eṣamāṇu sugatāna gocaraṃ mārgamāṇu virajāna cārikām /
S04bsu016_u:10746: yatra śikṣita atīta nāyakāḥ śikṣiṣenti tatha ye anāgatāḥ /

S04bsu016_u:10762: sarvadurgatiapāyaśodhakā eti mitra mama sādhu darśakāḥ // 76 //
S04bsu016_u:10764: eti sarvajinaguhyadhārakā eva mitra bhajateṣa paṇḍitaḥ // 77 //

S04bsu016_u:10770: anuśāsti ayu tasya kurvato paśyathā kathamaṭatyakhedavān // 80 //
S04bsu016_u:10771: eṣa sarvasukhasaukhya ujjhiya utsṛjitva amaropamaṃ gṛham /
S04bsu016_u:10774: eṣa āśaya viśodhya paṇḍitaḥ svāśrayaṃ jahiya mānuṣaṃ imam /
S04bsu016_u:10785: śūrabhūta abhayasya dāyako deśiko hi jagatāṃ bhaviṣyati // 87 //
S04bsu016_u:10804: durlabho jagi sadevamānuṣe yādṛśo ayu viśuddhamānasaḥ // 96 //
S04bsu016_u:10818: eṣa lokaśaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ eṣa sarvajagati prabhākaraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10825: yādṛśaṃ tava prayoga sūrataḥ śraddha yādṛśa tavā aninditaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10827: sarvabuddha nacireṇa drakṣyasi sarvakṣetra nacireṇa yāsyasi /
S04bsu016_u:10828: sarvadharma nacireṇa jñāsyasi tādṛśaṃ ti śubhamātmanā kṛtam // 106 //
S04bsu016_u:10831: tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi guṇān bhājanaṃ tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi śubhāna saṃbhavaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10832: tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi jinaurasaiḥ samo yādṛśaṃ ti adhimuktimaṇḍalam // 108 //
S04bsu016_u:10833: māramaṇḍala parājitaṃ tvayā karmamaṇḍala viśodhitaṃ ca te /
S04bsu016_u:10834: kleśamaṇḍala viśodhitaṃ tvayā yādṛśaṃ ti praṇidhānamaṇḍalam // 109 //
S04bsu016_u:10843: duḥkhajāla jagu mocayiṣyase tādṛśaḥ praṇidhijālu śodhitaḥ // 113 //
S04bsu016_u:10853: mokṣadvāramupaneṣyase jagat dvāru tādṛśu viśodhitaṃ tvayā // 118 //
S04bsu016_u:10856: bodhimārga tatha tvaṃ anuddhato mārgase dṛḍhamate atandritaḥ // 119 //
S04bsu016_u:10863: kṣetrasāgara bahu pravekṣyasi drakṣyase pariṣasāgarān bahūn /
S04bsu016_u:10869: tvaṃ samādhibhavanaṃ pravekṣyase tvaṃ vimokṣabhavanāni lapsyase /
S04bsu016_u:10877: nocireṇa spharamāṇu paśyase māruto va gagane asaṅgavān // 129 //
S04bsu016_u:10880: maiva kheda janayāhi sūratā tuṣṭi vindi vipulāṃ nirāmiṣam /
S04bsu016_u:10881: yena te imu vimokṣu īdṛśo dṛṣṭu paśyasi ca bhūyu drakṣyase // 131 //
S04bsu016_u:10883: tvaṃ samartha imu dhārituṃ nayaṃ tena paśyasi idaṃ vikurvitam // 132 //
S04bsu016_u:10884: yeṣa kalpanayutaiḥ sudurlabhaṃ darśanaṃ kutu guṇaprabhāvana /
S04bsu016_u:10885: tehi dṛṣṭa carato sucārikāṃ buddhaputra aniketagocarāḥ // 133 //
S04bsu016_u:10886: lābha bhūya vipulā acintiyā svāgataṃ ca tava mānuṣo bhava /
S04bsu016_u:10887: yena mañjuśiri dṛṣṭa saṃmukhamīdṛśaṃ kṛtu guṇān bhājanam // 134 //
S04bsu016_u:10890: duḥkhadharma tvayi sarva ujjhitāḥ sarvakheda ca vivarjitā bhava // 135 //
S04bsu016_u:10892: jñānabhūmi paripūrya uttamā buddhabhūmi nacireṇa lapsyase // 136 //
S04bsu016_u:10896: ye bhajanti ima mitra īdṛśāḥ te bhavanti nacireṇa nāyakāḥ // 138 //
S04bsu016_u:10897: dṛṣṭva sattva vinayaṃgatā bahu bodhisattvacari citra yāvat /
S04bsu016_u:10898: mā tu jātu vimatiṃ kariṣyase sarvadharmamukha bodhicārikam // 139 //
S04bsu016_u:10900: yena saṃpada imā tvamīdṛśī buddhaputra iha adya paśyasi // 140 //
S04bsu016_u:10901: paśya lābha tava kīdṛśo mahān paśyato jinasutā nirantaram /
S04bsu016_u:10904: tena co jinasutā nirantaraṃ te vimokṣanaya darśayanti mām // 142 //
S04bsu016_u:10905: kalpakoṭinayutāni te janā saṃvasanti sugatātmajaiḥ saha /
S04bsu016_u:10907: te 'pi teṣu na vidanti gocaraṃ nātma tairhi guṇabhājanaṃ kṛtam // 143 //
S04bsu016_u:10908: tvaṃ śṛṇoṣi ima īdṛśaṃ nayaṃ paśyase ca sudurlabhaṃ jage /
S04bsu016_u:10910: sarvabuddha samanvāharanti te bodhisattva tava saṃgrahasthitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10911: tvaṃ ca teṣa anuśāsanisthitaḥ sādhu sūdhana sujīvitaṃ tava // 145 //
S04bsu016_u:10912: bodhisattvakuladharmi vartase śikṣase jinasutāna tvaṃ guṇaiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10913: bheṣyase sugatavaṃśavardhanaḥ prīti vindahi udāra sudhanā // 146 //
S04bsu016_u:10914: sarvabuddha pitarastavāsamā bodhisattva tava sarvi bhrātaraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10915: bodhiaṅga tava sarvi jñātayaḥ tvaṃ sujātu sugatāna orasaḥ // 147 //
S04bsu016_u:10917: dharmarājamacireṇa lapsyase sūdhanā tuṣṭa bhava prīṇitendriyaḥ // 148 //
S04bsu016_u:10920: yādṛśaṃ vapati bīja yo naro tādṛśaṃ labhati tasya so phalam /
S04bsu016_u:10921: prīti vinda vipulāmacintiyāṃ eṣa te 'dya samanvāsayāmyaham // 150 //
S04bsu016_u:10923: cīrṇa kalpanayutāna ye carī bodhisattvanayutā acintiyā /
S04bsu016_u:10924: ta 'pi saṃpada labhanti nedṛśīmekajanmi pratilabdha yā tvayā // 151 //
S04bsu016_u:10925: sarvametadiha muktitaḥ phalaṃ āśayasya dṛḍhavīryatāya ca /
S04bsu016_u:10926: yasya cārika bhavediyaṃ priyā so dhareya sudhanasya yā carī // 152 //
S04bsu016_u:10928: sudhana eva samudānitāstvayā nityameṣa hi viśeṣacārikā // 153 //
S04bsu016_u:10931: eṣa bhotu tava darśito tayā bhadranāmacariyāya sūdhana /
S04bsu016_u:10932: eta jñātva sa kadāci bheṣyate sevamāna iha mitra tanmayaḥ // 155 //
S04bsu016_u:10933: kāyakoṭi smara pūrvikā tvayā kāmahetu kṣayitā nirarthakam /
S04bsu016_u:10934: adya bodhiya mārgaṇo hyayaṃ kāya tarjatu vratena suvrataḥ // 156 //
S04bsu016_u:10936: gaṅgavālikasamatā virāgitā buddha no ca śruta īdṛśo nayaḥ // 157 //
S04bsu016_u:10937: so idāni kṣaṇa labdha mānuṣo buddhapādu imu mitru īdṛśāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10938: śrūyate ca varabodhicārikā viśuddhi na bhaviṣyate katham // 158 //
S04bsu016_u:10940: bhoti bhūya sugatāna saṃbhavo mitradharmaśravaṇaṃ ca śrūyate /
S04bsu016_u:10941: no ca śrūyati ayaṃ punarnayo āśayo yadi na bhoti śodhitaḥ // 159 //
S04bsu016_u:10944: teṣa lābha paramā acintiyāsteṣa mānuṣabhavaḥ suāgataḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10945: yairiyaṃ cari praveśamīdṛśaṃ śrutva eva praṇidhī bhirnirhṛtā // 161 //
S04bsu016_u:10946: tasya sarvi sugatā na durlabhā tasya sarvi jinaputra nārataḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10947: tasya bodhayi na bhūyu saṃśayo yena eva adhimukti śodhitā // 162 //
S04bsu016_u:10948: tena sarvi vinayā na varjitāḥ tena sarvadukhadharma ujjhitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10949: tena sarvaguṇasaṃgrahaḥ kṛtaḥ yo imaṃ nayu praviṣṭa īdṛśam // 163 //
S04bsu016_u:10950: nocireṇa imu kāyu ujjhiyā buddhakṣetra pariśuddha yāsyasi /
S04bsu016_u:10952: pūrvahetughana tubhya sūdhana pratyutpanna adhimukti niścitā /
S04bsu016_u:10953: mitra sevasi viśeṣaarthikaḥ tena vardhayi jale yathotpalam // 165 //
S04bsu016_u:10959: yādṛśāya adhimuktisaṃpadā vandanaṃ kṛtamidaṃ tvayā mama /
S04bsu016_u:10964: bhadranāma vara carya uttamāṃ tanumantime praveśayiṣyati // 170 //
S04bsu016_u:10965: eva maitraku asaṅgagocaro dṛṣṭa sūdhana guṇaiḥ samudgatam /
S04bsu016_u:10966: darśayitva pariṣāya saṃmukhaṃ varṇakośamimu tasya vyāhari // 171 //
S04bsu016_u:10967: śrutva sūdhana tadānuśāsanīmīdṛśīṃ ca anuśāsti uttamām /
S04bsu016_u:10970: utthihitva sudhanaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ maitra nāma kurute pradakṣiṇam // 173 //
S04bsu016_u:10971: tasya mañjuśiri tena tejasā puṣpahāraratanā ca pāṇiṣu /
S04bsu016_u:10974: sūdhano varaprahṛṣṭamānaso maitrakasya kṣipi tāni harṣitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10975: tasya śīrṣu parimārjate tadā maitranātha sudhanaṃ ca bhāṣate // 175 //
S04bsu016_u:10976: sādhu sādhu jinaputra sūdhana yasya te aparikheda īdṛśaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10977: tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi guṇāna bhājanaṃ mañjughoṣu yatha yādṛśo va ham // 176 //
S04bsu016_u:10978: śrutva sūdhana udānudānayi durlabhā bhavaśateṣu īdṛśāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10979: mitra yebhiriha me samāgamaḥ sādu āgamanamadya me iha // 177 //
S04bsu016_u:10981: mitra labdha maya durlabhā ime bhotu me laghu samāgamasvayi // 178 //
S04bsu016_u:10982: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako maitreyasya bodhisattvasya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - ahamārya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāvabhisaṃprasthitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10983: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:11035: tadvadatu me āryaḥ - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ
S04bsu016_u:11042: mahābodhicaryārambhaṃ samāśvāsayati sadevakaṃ lokaṃ na visaṃvadati,
S04bsu016_u:11046: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvaḥ sarvaṃ tatparṣanmaṇḍalamavalokya sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamupadarśayannevamāha - paśyatha kulaputrā imaṃ śreṣṭhiputram,
S04bsu016_u:11057_1: paryupāsīno mañjuśriyā kumārabhūtena saṃpreṣito dhanyākarānnagarādupādāya sarvadakṣiṇāpathamaṭan
S04bsu016_u:11058_4: mahādharmayajñasaṃbhāropacayodyuktānāṃ nāmadheyaśravaṇaṃ vā rūpakāyadarśanaṃ vā gocarasaṃvāso
S04bsu016_u:11060: eṣa hi kulaputrāḥ satpuruṣaḥ sarvajagatparitrāṇāya abhyutthitaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:11063_0: eṣa hi kulaputrāḥ satpuruṣaḥ sattvānāṃ caturoghottaraṇatāyai mahādānaṃ mahādharmanāvaṃ
S04bsu016_u:11063_5: mahāśvāsaṃ dātukāmo bhavacārakāvaruddhānāṃ jñānaprahāṇaṃ dātukāmo dṛṣṭibandhanabaddhānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:11064: sa eṣa kulaputrāḥ satpuruṣaḥ evaṃ sattvaparitrāṇāya apratiprasrabdho bodhicittotpādaviśuddhiṃ parimārgamāṇo 'yamaparikhinno mahāyānasamudānayāya,
S04bsu016_u:11088: na hi kulaputrastāmanye bodhisattvāḥ kalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrairbodhisattvacaryāpraṇidhiparipūrimadhigamiṣyante buddhabodhau vasanto bhaviṣyanti buddhakṣetrapariśuddhau vā,
S04bsu016_u:11099_0: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya bhūtaguṇavarṇakīrtanaṃ
S04bsu016_u:11099_1: kṛtvā tadārambaṇaṃ ca prāṇiśatasahasrāṇāṃ bodhyaṅgāśayaṃ dṛḍhīkṛtya sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat
S04bsu016_u:11100: yena te sarvalokahitasukhāya sarvasattvadhātuparitrāṇāya sarvabuddhadharmapratilambhāya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
S04bsu016_u:11241: tasmāttarhi kulaputra yena anuttarāyāṃ samaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam,
S04bsu016_u:11251: evameva kulaputra sarvajñatācittauṣadhiparigṛhīto bodhisattvo rāgāgninā na dahyate,
S04bsu016_u:11258: evameva bodhicittajñānauṣadhiparigṛhītasya bodhisattvasya sarvasaṃsāropakramabhayāni na bhavanti /
S04bsu016_u:11263: tadyathā kulaputra aparājitabhaiṣajyagṛhītaḥ puruṣo 'jayo bhavati sarvaśatrumaṇḍalena,
S04bsu016_u:11264: evameva sarvajñatācittāparājitabhaiṣajyagṛhīto bodhisattvo durgharṣo bhavati sarvamārapratyarthikamaṇḍalena /
S04bsu016_u:11265: tadyathā kulaputra asti vigamo nāma bhaiṣajyam /
S04bsu016_u:11268: tadyathā kulaputra asti sudarśano nāma mahābhaiṣajyarājaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:11271: tadyathā kulaputra asti saṃtāno nāma mahābhaiṣajyavṛkṣaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:11274: evameva bodhisattvabījasaṃbhūtaḥ sarvajñatāsaṃtānavṛkṣaḥ sahadarśanena śrāddhānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ karmakleśavraṇān saṃrohayati /
S04bsu016_u:11292: evameva bodhicittādṛśyamahauṣadhigṛhīto vyavakīrṇavihārī bodhisattvaḥ sarvamāraviṣaye na dṛśyate /
S04bsu016_u:11293: tadyathā kulaputra asti sarvamaṇiratnasamuccayaṃ nāma mahāmaṇiratnarājaṃ mahāsamudre /
S04bsu016_u:11294: tasya anyalokadhātvasaṃkrāntasya asthānamanavakāśo yanmahāsamudrasya sarvakalpoddāhāgninā śakyaṃ tālamātramapi pariśoṣayitum /
S04bsu016_u:11304: tadyathā kulaputra udakasaṃvāsamaṇiratnāvabaddhaḥ kaivarta udake na mriyate,
S04bsu016_u:11305: evameva sarvajñatācittodakasaṃvāsamaṇiratnagṛhīto bodhisattvaḥ sarvasaṃsārasāgare na mriyate /
S04bsu016_u:11307: tena sahagate kaivartādayo jalajīvinaḥ sarvanāgabhavanāni praviśanto 'dhṛṣyā bhavanti sarvanāgoragaiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:11309: tadyathā kulaputra śakrābhilagnamaṇiratnāvabaddhaḥ śakro devarājo sarvadevagaṇānabhibhavati,
S04bsu016_u:11311: tadyathā kulaputra cintārājamahāmaṇiratnagṛhītaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvadāridryānna bibheti,
S04bsu016_u:11315: tadyathā kulaputra candrakāntaṃ nāma mahāmaṇiratnaṃ candrābhayā spṛṣṭamudakadhārāṃ pramuñcati,
S04bsu016_u:11318: tadyathā kulaputra cintārājamaṇimakuṭāvabaddhānāṃ mahānāgarājānāṃ nāsti paropakramabhayam,
S04bsu016_u:11320: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra jagadvyūhagarbhaṃ nāma mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sarvasattvābhiprāyaparipūraṇatayā na kadācitkṣayamupaiti,
S04bsu016_u:11322: tadyathā kulaputra rājñaścakravartino mahāmaṇiratnaḥ sa tamondhakāravidhamaṃ gacchati,
S04bsu016_u:11332: tadyathā kulaputra vaiḍūryamaṇiratnaṃ varṣaśatasahasramapi amedhyamadhyagataṃ tiṣṭhat sarvadaurgandhyena sārdhaṃ na saṃvasati,
S04bsu016_u:11334: tadyathā kulaputra ekamāgneyaṃ nāma mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sarvatamondhakāraṃ vidhamati,
S04bsu016_u:11335: evameva ekasarvajñatācittotpādāgneyamahāmaṇiratnaṃ vipaśyanāsaṃprayuktaṃ yoniśo manasikārataḥ sarvamajñānatamondhakāraṃ vidhamati /
S04bsu016_u:11336: tadyathā kulaputra mahāsamudre potāropitamanardhyeyamaṇiratnaṃ vaṇigghastagataṃ nagarapratiṣṭhāni kācamaṇiśatasahasrāṇyabhibhavati varṇataśca āyataśca,
S04bsu016_u:11338: tadyathāsti vaśirājaṃ nāma maṇiratnaṃ yajjambudvīpagatameva catvāriṃśadyojanasahasrasthitānāṃ candrasūryamaṇḍalānāṃ bhavanavimānapratibhāsavyūhān saṃdarśayati,
S04bsu016_u:11342: sarve te vaśirājamaṇiratnasya mūlyaṃ na kṣamante,
S04bsu016_u:11345: sarvāṇi tāni bodhicittotpādavaśirājamahāmaṇiratnasya mūlyaṃ na kṣamante /
S04bsu016_u:11346: tadyathā kulaputra asti sāgaravyūhagarbhaṃ nāma mahāmaṇiratnaṃ yatsarvamahāsāgaravyūhān saṃdarśayati,
S04bsu016_u:11348: tadyathā kulaputra cintārājamaṇiratnaṃ sthāpayitvā nāsti kiṃcitprativiśiṣṭataraṃ divyena jāmbūnadasuvarṇena,
S04bsu016_u:11351: tadyathā kulaputra nāgamaṇḍalasiddha āhituṇḍikaḥ sarvanāgoragān vaśe sthāpayati,
S04bsu016_u:11353: tadyathā kulaputra praharaṇagṛhītaḥ śūro durgharṣo bhavati śatrumaṇḍalena,
S04bsu016_u:11354: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādapraharaṇagṛhīto bodhisattvo durgharṣo bhavati sarvakleśaśatrumaṇḍalena /
S04bsu016_u:11355: tadyathā kulaputra divyoragasāracandanasya ekacūrṇadhāraṇaṃ sāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ gandhena spharati,
S04bsu016_u:11356: karṣapramāṇaṃ sarvatrisāhasre lokadhāturatnaparipūrṇena mūlyaṃ na kṣamate,
S04bsu016_u:11359: tadyathā kulaputra himavaccandanaṃ nāma mahācandanaratnaṃ sarvadāhaṃ praśamayati,
S04bsu016_u:11364: sarve te ekavarṇā bhavanti yaduta suvarṇavarṇāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:11366: sarve te ekavarṇā bhavanti yaduta sarvajñatāvarṇāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:11367: tadyathā kulaputra yaḥ pāriyātrakasya kovidārasya cchavigandhaḥ pravāti,
S04bsu016_u:11368: sa sarvajambudvīpe sarvavārṣikājātisumanādīnāṃ puṣpajātīnāṃ na saṃvidyate,
S04bsu016_u:11371: tadyathā kulaputra pāriyātrakasya kovidārasya śuṅgībhūtasya veditavyaṃ bahūnāṃ puṣpaśatasahasrāṇāmāyadvāraṃ bhaviṣyatīti,
S04bsu016_u:11372: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādapāriyātrakavṛkṣasya kuśalamūlaśuṅgībhūtasya veditavyamasaṃkhyeyānāṃ devamanuṣyāṇāṃ sāsravanāsravabodhikusumāyadvāraṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
S04bsu016_u:11373: tadyathā kulaputra yaḥ ekadivasaparibhāvitasya pāriyātrakusumairvastrasya tailasya vā gandhaḥ pravāti,
S04bsu016_u:11374: sa divasatasahasraparibhāvitasya campakavārṣikāsumanābhivastrasya vā tailasya vā na saṃvidyate /
S04bsu016_u:11375: evameva ya ekajanmaparibhāvitasya sarvajñatācittasaṃtānasya bodhisattvaguṇajñānagandho daśasu dikṣu sarvabuddhapādamūleṣu pravāti,
S04bsu016_u:11377: tadyathā kulaputra asti nālīkerī nāma vṛkṣajātiḥ udyatake samudre saṃbhūtā /
S04bsu016_u:11378: sā mūlata upādāya yāvatpuṣpaphalaparyantātsarvakālaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ na kadācinnopajīvyā bhavati /
S04bsu016_u:11379: evameva mahākaruṇāpraṇidhimūlasaṃjāto bodhisattvasya prathamasarvajñatācittotpādo yāvatsaddharmasthitiparyavasānāt sadevakasya lokasya na kadācinnopajīvyo bhavati /
S04bsu016_u:11380: tadyathā kulaputra asti hāṭakaprabhāsaṃ nāma rasajātam /
S04bsu016_u:11382: na ca tadrasapalaṃ śakyaṃ tena lohapalasahasreṇa paryādātuṃ na lohīkartum /
S04bsu016_u:11385: na ca sarvajñatācittotpādarasadhātuḥ śakyaṃ sarvakarmakleśalohaiḥ saṃkleśayituṃ paryādātuṃ vā /
S04bsu016_u:11386: tadyathā kulaputra kiyatparītto 'pyagniryāvadupādānaṃ labhate tāvatīṃ jvālāṃ pramuñcati,
S04bsu016_u:11390_0: akṣaya eva pradīpo bhavatyaparyādattaḥ sarvapradīpaniryāṇaiḥ evameva ekasmātsarvajñatācittotpādapradīpādatītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:11390_1: sarvatathāgatānāṃ sarvajñatācittotpādapradīpānāṃ dīpyamānānāmakṣaya eva sa ekaḥ sarvajñatācittotpādapradīpo
S04bsu016_u:11391: tadyathā kulaputra ekaḥ pradīpo yādṛśe gṛhe vātāyane vā praveśyate,
S04bsu016_u:11392: sahapraveśito varṣasahasrasaṃcitamapi tamondhakāraṃ vidhamati avabhāsaṃ ca karoti,
S04bsu016_u:11396: tadyathā kulaputra yādṛśī pradīpavartirbhavati tādṛśaṃ pradīpo 'vabhāsaṃ karoti,
S04bsu016_u:11398: evameva yasya bodhisattvasya yādṛśī praṇidhānavartiviśeṣatā bhavati,
S04bsu016_u:11402: tadyathā kulaputra divyajāmbūnadasuvarṇālaṃkāro vaśavartino devarājasya mūrdhnāvabaddho 'saṃhāryo bhavati sarvakāmāvacarairdevaputraiḥ,
S04bsu016_u:11404: tadyathā kulaputra siṃhasya mṛgarājasya nādena acirajātāḥ siṃhapotāḥ puṣyanti,
S04bsu016_u:11406: evameva tathāgatapuruṣasiṃhasya bodhicittasaṃvarṇanasarvajñatānādena prayuktena sarvādikarmikabodhisattvasiṃhapotāḥ puṣyanti buddhadharmaiḥ,
S04bsu016_u:11413: evameva kalpaśatasahasrasaṃcitaḥ karmakleśakṣīramahāsamudraḥ tathāgatamahāpuruṣasiṃhasarvajñatācittotpādadugdhaikabinduprakṣepeṇa sarvo 'navaśeṣaḥ kṣayaṃ gacchanti,
S04bsu016_u:11416: tadyathā kulaputra aṇḍakośādanirgatasya kalaviṅkapotasya yo nādabalaviśeṣaḥ sarvabalavegasaṃpannānāṃ himavannivāsināṃ sarvapakṣigaṇānāṃ na saṃvidyate,
S04bsu016_u:11417: evameva yaḥ saṃsārāṇḍakośagatasyādikarmikabodhisattvakalaviṅkapotasya mahākaruṇābodhicittanādabalaviśeṣaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ na saṃvidyate /
S04bsu016_u:11418: tadyathā kulaputra yo 'cirajātasya mahāgaruḍendrapotasya pakṣavātabalaparākramo nayanapariśuddhiguṇaśca, (Gv 403)
S04bsu016_u:11419: sa sarvaśarīrapravṛddhānāṃ tadanyeṣāṃ pakṣiṇāṃ na saṃvidyate,
S04bsu016_u:11422: tadyathā kulaputra mahāpuruṣahastagato nārācaḥ kiyaddṛḍhamapi varma nirbhinatti,
S04bsu016_u:11427: evameva mahāmaitrīmahākarūṇāviṣṭasya bodhisattvamahānagnasya yāvadadhyāśayavadane sarvajñatācittotpādapiṭakā na vigacchanti,
S04bsu016_u:11429: tadyathā kulaputra yaḥ śikṣitasyeṣvastrāntevāsina iṣvastrajñāne kṛtābhyāsasya śilpasthānayogabalaviśeṣaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:11431: evameva yaḥ sarvādikarmikasya sarvajñatābhūmyā kṛtābhyāsasya bodhisattvājāneyasya praṇidhijñānādhimukticaryābalaviśeṣaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:11433: tadyathā kulaputra iṣvastraṃ śikṣamāṇasya prathamaḥ padabandhayogyābhyāsaḥ pūrvaṃgamo bhavati sarveṣvastrajñānasya,
S04bsu016_u:11434: evameva bodhisattvasya sarvajñabhūmau śikṣamāṇasya prathamaṃ sarvajñatācittādhyāśayasaṃprasthānaṃ pūrvagamaṃ bhavati sarvabuddhadharmādhigamāya /
S04bsu016_u:11435: tadyathā kulaputra māyākārasya māyāgataviṣayaṃ saṃdarśayamānasya prathamamantrapadasiddhyabhinirhārameva manasikurvāṇasya sarvakriyāsiddhirbhavati,
S04bsu016_u:11436: evameva bodhisattvasya sarvabuddhabodhisattvaviṣayavikurvāḥ saṃdarśayataḥ prathamacittotpādapraṇidhānābhinirhāra evotthāpako bhavati sarvabuddhabodhisattvaviṣayasya /
S04bsu016_u:11437: tadyathā kulaputra sarvamāyāvidyāmantrāścārūpiṇo 'nidarśanāḥ sarvamāyānirmāṇarūpagatāni saṃdarśayanti cittotpādena,
S04bsu016_u:11439: tadyathā kulaputra mārjārasya sahadṛṣṭavicāramātreṇa sarvamūṣikā vilayamāpadyante,
S04bsu016_u:11441: tadyathā kulaputra jāmbūnadasuvarṇālaṃkāra ābaddhaḥ sarvābharaṇāni jihmīkaroti,
S04bsu016_u:11443: tadyathā kulaputra ayaskāntarājasya kiyatparītto 'pi dhātuḥ sarvadṛḍhamāyasaṃ bandhanaṃ sphoṭayati,
S04bsu016_u:11449: evameva yatra yatraiva sarvajñatācittotpādadhāturvicāryate kārmeṣu vā kleśeṣu vā śrāvakapratyekabuddhavimuktau vā,
S04bsu016_u:11450: tatastata eva karmakleśāḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhavimuktayaśca palāyante na tiṣṭhanti,
S04bsu016_u:11452: tadyathā kulaputra makaraviddhāśritaḥ kaivartaḥ sarvodakaprāṇibhayavinirvṛto bhavatyanupaghātaśarīro makaramukhagato 'pi,
S04bsu016_u:11455: tadyathā kulaputra amṛtapānapītaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvaparopakramairna mriyate,
S04bsu016_u:11456: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādāmṛtapānapīto bodhisattvaḥ sarvaśrāvakabhūmiṣu na mriyate,
S04bsu016_u:11458: tadyathā kulaputra añjanasiddhaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvamanuṣyabhavaneṣu cānuvicarati na ca sarvamanuṣyairdṛśyate,
S04bsu016_u:11461: tadyathā kulaputra mahārājasaṃniśritaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvaprākṛtajanāt na bibheti,
S04bsu016_u:11465: tadyathā kulaputra śūrasaṃniśritaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvaśatrubhyo na bibheti,
S04bsu016_u:11466: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādaśūrasaṃniśrito bodhisattvaḥ sarvaduścaritaśatrubhyo na bibheti /
S04bsu016_u:11467: tadyathā kulaputra vajrapraharaṇagṛhītaḥ śakro devendraḥ sarvāsuragaṇaṃ pramardayati,
S04bsu016_u:11469: tadyathā kulaputra rasāyanopayuktaḥ puruṣo dīrghamāyuḥ pālayati na ca durbalībhavati,
S04bsu016_u:11470: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādarasāyanasaṃbhāraprayukto bodhisattvo 'saṃkhyeyān kalpān saṃsāre saṃsaranna parikhidyate,
S04bsu016_u:11472: tadyathā kulaputra sarvabhaiṣajyarasasaṃprayogeṣu pānīyaṃ pūrvaṃgamaṃ na kvacidduṣyati,
S04bsu016_u:11475: tadyathā kulaputra puruṣasya sarvakāryeṣu jīvitendriyaṃ pūrvaṃgamam,
S04bsu016_u:11477: tadyathā kulaputra jīvitendriyavimuktaḥ puruṣo nirupajīvyo bhavati mātāpitṛjñātivargasya sarvakarmāsamarthatvāt,
S04bsu016_u:11478: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādaviyukto bodhisattvaḥ sarvajñatāguṇanirupajīvyo bhavati sarvasattvānāṃ buddhajñānapratilambhāsamarthatvāt /
S04bsu016_u:11484: tadyathā kulaputra acirajāto rājaputro mūrdhaprāptān sarvavṛddhāmātyānabhibhavati kulābhijātyādhipatyena,
S04bsu016_u:11486: tadyathā kulaputra kiyadvṛddhenāpyamātyena kiyadbālasyāpi rājakumārasya praṇipatitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:11487: na ca rājaputreṇa vṛddhāmātyasya gauravaṃ na karaṇīyam,
S04bsu016_u:11488: evameva kiyadvṛddhairapi ciracaritabrahmacaryaiḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhairādikarmikasya bodhisattvasya avanamitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:11489: na ca bodhisattvena pratyekabuddheṣu gauravaṃ na karaṇīyam /
S04bsu016_u:11491: sarvāparibhūto rājaputro 'virahito rājalakṣaṇena sarvāgratāprāptairapi rājāmātyairna samo jātyadhyakṣatvāt,
S04bsu016_u:11496: tadyathā kulaputra sarvavidyauṣadhisaṃgrahasaṃprayukto bhaiṣajyavigraho darśanasparśanasaṃvāsanaiḥ sattvānāṃ vyādhīn śamayati,
S04bsu016_u:11498: tadyathā kulaputra haṃsalakṣaṇaṃ vastraṃ sarvakardamadoṣairna kliśyate,
S04bsu016_u:11500: tadyathā kulaputra mūrdhaśalyasaṃgṛhīto dāruvigraho na vikīryate,
S04bsu016_u:11504: tadyathā kulaputra śalyavimuktaṃ yantramakāryasamarthaṃ bhavati tānyeva dārupratyaṅgāni,
S04bsu016_u:11507: tadyathā kulaputra rājñaścakravartino hastigarbhaṃ nāma kālāgaruratnam /
S04bsu016_u:11508: tena saha dhūpitamātraḥ sarvarājñaścaturaṅgabalakāyo vihāyase tiṣṭhati /
S04bsu016_u:11509: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādāgarudhūpitāni bodhisattvasya kuśalamūlāni sarvatraidhātukavyativṛttāni bhavanti asaṃskṛtasarvatathāgatajñānagaganagocaraparyavasānāni /
S04bsu016_u:11514: tasya mūlapratiṣṭhānaṃ nopalabhyate sarvaśākhāpatrapalāśasaṃkusumitā ca vṛkṣeṣu jālībhūtā ca saṃdṛśyate,
S04bsu016_u:11517: tadyathā kulaputra vajraṃ netare bhājane tiṣṭhacchobhate,
S04bsu016_u:11519: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādavajraṃ na hīnādhimuktikeṣu sattvabhājaneṣu matsariṣu duḥśīleṣu vyāpannacitteṣu kusīdeṣu muṣitasmṛtiṣu duḥprajñeṣu śobhate,
S04bsu016_u:11525: tadyathā kulaputra bhinnamapi vajraratnaṃ sarvaratnaprativiśiṣṭaṃ suvarṇālaṃkāramabhibhavati,
S04bsu016_u:11527: (Gv 406) tadyathā kulaputra bhinnamapi vajraratnaṃ sarvadāridryaṃ vinivartayati,
S04bsu016_u:11531: tadyathā kulaputra vajraratnaṃ na prākṛtajanahastagataṃ bhavati,
S04bsu016_u:11534: tadyathā kulaputra ratnaparīkṣānabhijñaḥ puruṣo vajramaṇiratnaguṇānajānan nāsya guṇaviśeṣamanubhavati,
S04bsu016_u:11536: tadyathā kulaputra vajraṃ na śakyaṃ jarayitum,
S04bsu016_u:11537: evameva sarvajñatāhetubhūtaṃ bodhicittotpādavajraṃ na śakyaṃ jarayitum /
S04bsu016_u:11538: tadyathā kulaputra vajraṃ mahāpraharaṇaṃ na śakyaṃ mahānagnenāpi saṃdhārayitumanyatra mahānārāyaṇasthāmabalavegena,
S04bsu016_u:11540: tadyathā kulaputra yatra sarvapraharaṇāni na prasahante tatra vajraṃ prasahate,
S04bsu016_u:11542: evameva yatra sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhapraṇidhijñānapraharaṇāni na prasahante sattvaparipākavinaye vā tryadhvakalpacaryāduḥkhasaṃvāse vā,
S04bsu016_u:11545: tadyathā kulaputra vajraṃ na śakyaṃ kenacitpṛthivī pradeśena saṃdhārayitumanyatra vajratalena,
S04bsu016_u:11548: evameva bodhisattvavajrācchidradṛḍhatalapariṇāmanāpratiṣṭhitāni bodhisattvasya kuśalamūlāni na kṣīyante sarvabhavopapattiṣu /
S04bsu016_u:11549: tadyathā kulaputra vajratalapratiṣṭhitā mahāpṛthivī na vidīryate na saṃsīdati,
S04bsu016_u:11550: evameva bodhicittotpādavajradṛḍhatalapratiṣṭhitāni bodhisattvapraṇidhānāni sarvatraidhātuke na vidīryante na saṃsīdanti /
S04bsu016_u:11552: evameva bodhicittotpādavajraṃ sarvakarmakleśodakena sarvakarmasaṃvāsairna klidyate na svidyate /
S04bsu016_u:11553: tadyathā kulaputra vajraṃ sarvāgnidāhairna dahyate na saṃtapyate,
S04bsu016_u:11557: niṣīdatāṃ māraṃ yodhayatāṃ sarvajñatābhisaṃbuddhamānānāṃ nānyena pṛthivīpradeśena śakyamāsanaṃ saṃdhārayitumanyatra trisāhasramahāsāhasravajranābhidharaṇitalena,
S04bsu016_u:11558_0: evameva bodhisattvānāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau praṇidadhatāṃ caryāṃ caratāṃ pāramitāḥ
S04bsu016_u:11558_1: paripūrayatāṃ kṣāntimavakrāmatāṃ bhūmiṃ pratilabhamānānāṃ kuśalamūlāni pariṇāmayatāṃ
S04bsu016_u:11558_3: mahādharmameghān saṃdhārayatāṃ te mahākuśalamūlabalādhānavegā nānyena cittena śakyāḥ
S04bsu016_u:11559: iti hi (Gv 407) kulaputra ebhiśca anyaiśca apramāṇairyāvadanabhilāpyānabhilāpyairguṇaviśeṣaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sarvajñatācittotpādaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:11560: te 'pi sattvā evaṃguṇadharmasamanvāgatā bhūtāśca bhaviṣyanti ca,
S04bsu016_u:11563: yastvamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya bodhisattvacaryāṃ parimārgasi eṣāṃ guṇānāṃ pratilābhāya //
S04bsu016_u:11564: api ca kulaputra yadvadasi - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:11567: asya vairocanavyūhālaṃkāragarbhasya mahākūṭāgārasya abhyantaraṃ praviśya vyavalokaya /
S04bsu016_u:11570: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā evamāha - vivṛṇu ārya asya kūṭāgārasya dvāram /
S04bsu016_u:11572: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo vairocanavyūhālaṃkāragarbhasya kūṭāgārasya dvāramūlamupasaṃkramya dakṣiṇena pāṇinā acchaṭāśabdamakārṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:11575: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ paramāścaryaprāptastatkūṭāgāraṃ prāviśat /
S04bsu016_u:11577_0: so 'drākṣīt taṃ kūṭāgāraṃ vipulavistīrṇaṃ bahuyojanaśatasahasravistīrṇaṃ gaganatalāpramāṇaṃ
S04bsu016_u:11582: te cāsya kūṭāgāravyūhā anyonyāsaṃbhinnā anyonyāmaitrībhūtā anyonyāsaṃkīrṇāḥ pratibhāsayogena ābhāsamagaman ekasminnārambaṇe /
S04bsu016_u:11585_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako vairocanavyūhālaṃkāragarbhasya mahākūṭāgārasya
S04bsu016_u:11586: samanantarapraṇipatitamātraśca sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako maitreyasya bodhisattvasya adhiṣṭhānabalena sarveṣu teṣu kūṭāgāreṣvabhyantarapraviṣṭamātmānaṃ saṃjānīte sma /
S04bsu016_u:11588: kvacitkūṭāgāre yatra maitreyeṇa bodhisattvena prathamaṃ praṇidhānacittamutpāditamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04bsu016_u:11589_0: yannāmagotropapannena yena kuśalamūlena yayā samādāpanayā yena kalyāṇamitrasaṃcodanena
S04bsu016_u:11589_1: yadāyuḥpramāṇena yannāmake kalpe yatratathāgate yadvyūhe yādṛśyāṃ parṣadi yādṛśena
S04bsu016_u:11592: yāvacca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasya ca tathāgatasya tena samayenāyuḥpramāṇamabhūt,
S04bsu016_u:11593: tāvatkāle tasya tathāgatasya pādamulagatamātmānaṃ saṃjānīte sma /
S04bsu016_u:11595: kvacitkūṭāgāre yatra maitreyeṇa bodhisattvena prathamo maitrasamādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:11596: yata upādāya asya maitreya iti saṃjñodapādi tadadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:11605: yathā vyākṛto yena vyākṛto yāvaccireṇa ca vyākṛtastatsarvamadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:11606: sa kvacitkūṭāgāre maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ cakravartirājabhūtaṃ sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayamānamapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:11618: tatra maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ prabhayā mahānarakānavabhāsya narakopapannānāṃ sattvānāṃ sarvanirayaduḥkhaṃ praśamayamānamadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:11620: tatra maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ pretabhavanopapannānāṃ sattvānāṃ vipulamannapānamupasaṃhṛtya kṣutpipāsāṃ praśamayamānamadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:11621: kvacitkūṭāgāre tiryagyonau vividhopapatyāyatanavimātratayā tiryagyonigatān sattvān vinayantamadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:11628: kvacidyāvaddaśabhūmisthitairbodhisattvaiḥ saha maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ sarvabhūmivaiśeṣikatāṃ saṃgāyantamapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:11640_0: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ nānāvimātratāṃ janmakulavimātratāṃ kāyavyūhāpramāṇavimātratāmāyurvimātratāṃ
S04bsu016_u:11641: madhye ca vairocanavyūhālaṃkāragarbhasya mahākūṭāgārasya ekamudārataraṃ vistīrṇataraṃ ca tadanyasarvakūṭāgārāśeṣasarvavyūhātiriktataravyūhasamalaṃkṛtaṃ kūṭāgāramadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:11643: tasmiṃśca trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau koṭīśataṃ cāturdvīpikānāṃ koṭīśataṃ jambudvīpakānāṃ koṭīśataṃ tuṣitabhavanānāmadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:11644: sa tatra jambudvīpeṣu maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ padmagarbhagataṃ jāyamānamapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:11645_0: śakrabrahmābhyāṃ pratīkṣyamāṇaṃ saptapadāni prakrāntaṃ daśa diśo vyavalokayamānaṃ
S04bsu016_u:11645_1: mahāsiṃhanādaṃ nadantaṃ sarvakumārabhūmiṃ saṃdarśayamānaṃ antaḥpuramadhye gatamudyānabhūmiṃ
S04bsu016_u:11645_3: paribhuñjānaṃ bodhimaṇḍamupasaṃkrāntaṃ māraṃ dharṣayamāṇaṃ bodhiṃ vibudhyamānaṃ bodhivṛkṣamanimiṣaṃ

S04bsu016_u:12035_0: yāśceha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau pūrvāntakoṭīgatāḥ sarvalokadhātuparaṃparāḥ tā api sarvāḥ
S04bsu016_u:12037: yathā ceha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau pūrvāntāparāntakoṭīgatāḥ sarvalokadhātuparaṃparā adrākṣīt,
S04bsu016_u:12038_0: evaṃ daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu pūrvāntāparāntakoṭīgatāḥ sarvalokadhātuparaṃparāḥ
S04bsu016_u:12039: yathā ca samantabhadraṃ bodhisattvaṃ bhagavato vairocanasya tathāgatasya purato mahāratnapadmagarbhasiṃhāsane niṣaṇṇamadrākṣīt etadvikrīḍitaṃ saṃdarśayamānam,
S04bsu016_u:12040: evaṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi bhagavato bhadraśriyastathāgatasya padmaśriyāṃ lokadhātāvetadeva vikrīḍitaṃ saṃdarśayamānamadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:12042: evaṃ samantātsarvadigvidikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu sarvatathāgatapādamūleṣu samantabhadraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāratnapadmagarbhasiṃhāsane niṣaṇṇametadeva
S04bsu016_u:12045: evaṃ sarvalokadhātuṣu tathāgatapādamūleṣu mahāratnapadmagarbhasiṃhāsane niṣaṇṇametadeva vikrīḍitaṃ saṃdarśayamānamadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:12046_0: evaṃ samantāddaśasu dikṣu sarvabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu ekaikasmin paramāṇurajasi
S04bsu016_u:12050: sa tadacintyaṃ samantabhadramahābodhisattvavikrīḍitaṃ dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca daśa jñānapāramitāvihārān pratyalabhata /
S04bsu016_u:12063: tasyaivaṃ jñānapāramitāvihārasamanvāgatasya sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya samantabhadrao bodhisattvo dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ prasārya mūrdhni pratiṣṭhāpayāmāsa /
S04bsu016_u:12064: samanantarapratiṣṭhāpitaśca sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya samantabhadreṇa bodhisattvena mūrdhni pāṇiḥ,
S04bsu016_u:12075: yathā ceha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau bhagavato vairocanasya pādamūlagataḥ samantabhadro bodhisattvo dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ prasārya sudhanasya murdhni pratiṣṭhāpayāmāsa,
S04bsu016_u:12076: tathā sarvalokadhātuṣu sarvatathāgatapādamūleṣu niṣaṇṇaḥ samantabhadro bodhisattvo dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ prasārya sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya mūrdhni pratiṣṭhāpayāmāsa /
S04bsu016_u:12077_1: sarvatathāgatapādamūleṣu niṣaṇṇaḥ samantabhadro bodhisattvo dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ prasārya
S04bsu016_u:12078: yathā bhagavato vairocanasya pādamūlagatena samantabhadreṇa bodhisattvena pāṇinā spṛṣṭasya sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya
S04bsu016_u:12080: evaṃ sarvasamantabhadrātmabhāvaprasṛtaiḥ pāṇimeghaiḥ spṛṣṭasya sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya dharmamukhānyavakrāntānyabhūvan nānānayaiḥ //
S04bsu016_u:12081: atha khalu samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - dṛṣṭaṃ te kulaputra mama vikurvitam?
S04bsu016_u:12083: api tu tathāgataḥ prajānan prajānīyāttāvadacintyamidaṃ vikurvitam /
S04bsu016_u:12084: so 'vocat - ahaṃ kulaputra anabhilāpyānabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān kalpān vicaritaḥ sarvajñatācittamabhilaṣamāṇaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:12086: ekaikasmiṃśca mahākalpe sarvatyāgasamāyuktāḥ sarvalokavighuṣṭā mahāyajñā yaṣṭāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:12106: ekaikasmiṃśca mahākalpe 'nabhilāpyānabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatāḥ parameśvarabhūtena satkṛtā gurukṛtā mānitāḥ pūjitāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:12108: teṣāṃ ca asmiṃstathāgatānāṃ śāsane pravrajitā sarvabuddhānuśāsanīṣu pratipannaḥ śāsanaṃ ca me teṣāṃ saṃdhāritam //
S04bsu016_u:12109: nābhijānāmi kulaputra tāvadbhiḥ kalpasamudrerekacittotpādamapi tathāgaśāsane vilopamutpādayituṃ nābhijānāmi /
S04bsu016_u:12110_1: vā ātmagrahaparigrahacittaṃ vā ātmaparanānātvacittaṃ vā bodhimārgavipravāsacittaṃ
S04bsu016_u:12110_2: vā saṃsārasaṃvāsaparikhedacittaṃ vā avalīnacittaṃ vā āvaraṇasaṃmohacittaṃ vā utpādayitumanyatra
S04bsu016_u:12111: iti hi kulaputra sarvakalpasāgarāḥ kṣayaṃ vrajeyuḥ tānnirdiśato ye mama pūrvayogasaṃbuddhakṣetrapariśuddhiprayogāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:12117: tāvadbhyo me kulaputra dharmasamudrebhyo na kiṃcidekapadavyañjanamapi yanna cakravartirājyaparityāgena krītam,
S04bsu016_u:12120_0: tena mayā kulaputra anena evaṃrūpeṇa saṃbhārabalena mūlahetūpacayabalena udārādhimuktibalena
S04bsu016_u:12122: sarvalokābhudgataḥ sarvajagadyathāśayavijñapanaḥ sarvatrānugataḥ sarvabuddhakṣetraprasṛtaḥ samantapratiṣṭhānaḥ sarvataḥ sarvavikurvitasaṃdarśanaḥ sarvajagadabhilakṣaṇīyaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:12124: nāhaṃ kulaputra anavaropitakuśalamūlānāṃ sattvānāṃ śravaṇapathamapyāgacchāmi prāgeva darśanam /
S04bsu016_u:12126: ye mama nāmadheyaśravaṇamātreṇa avaivartikā bhavantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu016_u:12132: santi svapne nāmadheyaśravaṇena avaivartikā bhavantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu016_u:12134_0: kecidardhamāsaṃ kecinmāsaṃ kecidvarṣaṃ kecidvarṣaśataṃ kecitkalpaṃ kecitkalpaśataṃ
S04bsu016_u:12143: iti hi kulaputra buddhākṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamairupāyaiḥ sattvā avaivartikā bhavantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu016_u:12144: ye khalu punaḥ kulaputra sattvā mama buddhakṣetrapariśuddhiṃ śṛṇvanti,
S04bsu016_u:12150: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya kāyamupanidhyāyannadrākṣīt ekaikasmin romavivare 'nabhilāpyabuddhakṣetrasāgarān buddhotpādaparipūrṇān /
S04bsu016_u:12152: sarvāṃśca tān kṣetrasāgarān nānāpratiṣṭhānān nānāsaṃsthānān nānāvyūhān nānācakravālān nānāmeghagaganasaṃchannān nānābuddhotpādān nānādharmacakranirghoṣānapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:12154: tathā anavaśeṣataḥ sarvaromavivareṣu sarvalakṣaṇeṣu sarvānuvyañjaneṣu sarvāṅgapratyaṅgeṣu /
S04bsu016_u:12155_1: daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātūn spharitvā anuttarāyāṃ samyakaṃbodhau sattvān paripācayamānānapaśyat //
S04bsu016_u:12156: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ samantabhadrabodhisattvāvavādānuśāsanyanuśiṣṭaḥ samantabhadrabodhisattvakāyāntargateṣu sarvalokadhātuṣvavatīrya sattvān paripācayāmāsa /
S04bsu016_u:12157: ye ca khalu punaḥ sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamakalyāṇamitropasaṃkramadarśanaparyupāsanajñānālokakuśalamūlopacayāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:12158: te samantabhadrabodhisattvasahadarśanena kuśalamūlopacayasya śatatamīmapi kalāṃ nopayānti,
S04bsu016_u:12160: saṃkhyāmapi kalāmapi gaṇanāmapi upamāmapi upanisāmapi na kṣamante saprathamacittotpādāya yāvatsamantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya darśanam /
S04bsu016_u:12164_1: pareṇa aparāntakoṭīgatakalpādhiṣṭhānalokadhātuṃ pareṇa vikrameṇa paryantaṃ nopajagāma /
S04bsu016_u:12169: cittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe ca anantamadhyān kṣetrasāgarānavatarati sma,
S04bsu016_u:12173_0: atha khalu samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ evameva lokadhātuparaṃparānabhilāpyānabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān
S04bsu016_u:12173_1: kalpān kalpaprasarānabhidyotayamāno bhūyasyā mātrayā gāthābhigītena praṇidhānamakārṣīt -
S04bsu016_u:12174: yāvata keci daśaddiśi loke sarvatriyadhvagatā narasiṃhāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:12175: tānahu vandami sarvi aśeṣān kāyatu vāca manena prasannaḥ // 1 //
S04bsu016_u:12182: sarvajināna guṇān bhaṇamānastān sugatān stavamī ahu sarvān // 4 //
S04bsu016_u:12184: dīpavarebhi ca dhūpavarebhiḥ pūjana teṣa jināna karomi // 5 //
S04bsu016_u:12187: yā ca anuttara pūja udārā tānadhimucyami sarvajinānām /
S04bsu016_u:12189: yacca kṛtaṃ mayi pāpu bhaveyyā rāgatu dveṣatu mohavaśena /
S04bsu016_u:12190: kāyatu vāca manena tathaiva taṃ pratideśayamī ahu sarvam // 8 //
S04bsu016_u:12191: yacca daśaddiśi puṇya jagasya śaikṣa aśaikṣapratyekajinānām /
S04bsu016_u:12192: buddhasutānatha sarvajinānāṃ taṃ anumodayamī ahu sarvam // 9 //
S04bsu016_u:12193: ye ca daśaddiśi lokapradīpā bodhivibuddha asaṅgataprāptāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:12194: tānahu sarvi adhyeṣami nāthāṃ cakru anuttaru vartanatāyai // 10 //
S04bsu016_u:12199: yacca śubhaṃ mayi saṃcitu kiṃcidbodhayi nāmayamī ahu sarvam // 12 //
S04bsu016_u:12200: pūjita bhontu atītaka buddhā ye ca ghriyanti daśaddiśi loke /
S04bsu016_u:12201: ye ca anāgata te laghu bhontu pūrṇamanoratha bodhivibuddhāḥ // 13 //
S04bsu016_u:12202: yāvat keci daśaddiśi kṣetrāste pariśuddha bhavantu udārāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:12204: yāvat keci daśaddiśi sattvāste sukhitāḥ sada bhontu arogāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:12205: sarvajagasya ca dharmiku artho bhontu pradakṣiṇu ṛdhyatu āśā // 15 //
S04bsu016_u:12206: bodhicariṃ ca ahaṃ caramāṇo bhavi jātismaru sarvagatīṣu /
S04bsu016_u:12207: sarvasu janmasu cyutyupapattī pravrajito ahu nityu bhaveyyā // 16 //
S04bsu016_u:12211: yāni ca sarvarutāni jagasya sarvaruteṣvahu deśayi dharmam // 18 //
S04bsu016_u:12212: ye khalu pāramitāsvabhiyukto bodhiyi cittu ma jātu vimuhyet /
S04bsu016_u:12214: ye 'pi ca pāpaka āvaraṇīyāsteṣu parikṣayu bhotu aśeṣam // 19 //
S04bsu016_u:12215: karmatu kleśatu mārapathāto lokagatīṣu vimuktu careyam /
S04bsu016_u:12216: padma yathā salilena aliptaḥ sūrya śaśī gaganeva asaktaḥ // 20 //
S04bsu016_u:12217: sarvi apāyadukhāṃ praśamanto sarvajagat sukhi sthāpayamānaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:12218: sarvajagasya hitāya careyaṃ yāvata kṣetrapathā diśatāsu // 21 //
S04bsu016_u:12220: bhadracariṃ ca prabhāvayamānaḥ sarvi anāgatakalpa careyam // 22 //
S04bsu016_u:12221: ye ca sabhāgata mama caryāye tebhi samāgamu nityu bhaveyyā /
S04bsu016_u:12222: kāyatu vācatu cetanato vā ekacari praṇidhāna careyam // 23 //
S04bsu016_u:12223: ye 'pi ca mitrā mama hitakāmā bhadracarīya nidarśayitāraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:12224: tebhi samāgamu nityu bhaveyyā tāṃśca ahaṃ na virāgayi jātu // 24 //
S04bsu016_u:12225: saṃmukha nityamahaṃ jina paśye buddhasutebhi parīvṛtu nāthān /
S04bsu016_u:12226: teṣu ca pūja kareya udārāṃ sarvi anāgatakalpamakhinnaḥ // 25 //
S04bsu016_u:12228: bhadracariṃ ca viśodhayamānaḥ sarvi anāgatakalpa careyam // 26 //
S04bsu016_u:12230: sarvabhaveṣu ca saṃsaramāṇaḥ puṇyatu jñānatu akṣayaprāptaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:12232: ekarajāgri rajopamakṣetrā tatra ca kṣetri acintiya buddhān /
S04bsu016_u:12233: buddhasutāna niṣaṇṇaku madhye paśyiya bodhicariṃ caramāṇaḥ // 28 //
S04bsu016_u:12240: ekakṣaṇena anāgata sarvān kalpapraveśa ahaṃ praviśeyam /
S04bsu016_u:12241: ye 'pi ca kalpa triyadhvapramāṇāstān kṣaṇakoṭipraviṣṭa careyam // 32 //
S04bsu016_u:12242: ye ca triyadhvagatā narasiṃhāstānahu paśyiya ekakṣaṇena /
S04bsu016_u:12243: teṣu ca gocarimotari nityaṃ māyagatena vimokṣabalena // 33 //
S04bsu016_u:12247: ye ca ānāgata lokapradīpāsteṣu vibudhyana cakrapravṛttim /
S04bsu016_u:12248: nirvṛtidarśananiṣṭha praśāntiṃ sarvi ahaṃ upasaṃkrami nāthān // 35 //
S04bsu016_u:12260: tānahu pūrayi sarvi aśeṣān bhadracarīya vibudhyiya bodhim // 41 //
S04bsu016_u:12262: jyeṣṭhaku yaḥ sutu sarvajinānāṃ yasya ca nāma samantatabhadraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:12263: tasya vidusya sabhāgacarīye nāmayamī kuśalaṃ imu sarvam // 42 //
S04bsu016_u:12265: yādṛśa nāmana bhadra vidusya tādṛśa bhotu samaṃ mama tena // 43 //
S04bsu016_u:12267: sarvi anāgata kalpamakhinnaḥ pūrayi tāṃ kriya sarvi aśeṣām // 44 //
S04bsu016_u:12268: no ca pramāṇu bhaveyya carīye no ca pramāṇu bhaveyya guṇānām /
S04bsu016_u:12269: apramāṇa cariyāya sthihitvā jānami sarvi vikurvitu teṣām // 45 //
S04bsu016_u:12270: yāvata niṣṭha nabhasya bhaveyyā sattva aśeṣata niṣṭha tathaiva /
S04bsu016_u:12271: karmatu kleśatu yāvata niṣṭhā tāvataniṣṭha mama praṇidhānam // 46 //
S04bsu016_u:12272: ye ca daśaddiśi kṣetra anantā rathaalaṃkṛtu dadyu jinānām /
S04bsu016_u:12273: divya ca mānuṣa saukhyaviśiṣṭāṃ kṣetrarajopama kalpa dadeyam // 47 //
S04bsu016_u:12276: varjita tena bhavanti apāyā varjita tena bhavanti kumitrāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:12277: kṣipru sa paśyati taṃ amitābhaṃ yasyimu bhadracaripraṇidhānam // 49 //
S04bsu016_u:12279: lābha sulabdha sujīvitu teṣāṃ svāgata te imu mānuṣa janma /
S04bsu016_u:12280: yādṛśa so hi samantatabhadraste 'pi tathā nacireṇa bhavanti // 50 //
S04bsu016_u:12281: pāpaka pañca anantariyāṇi yena ajñānavaśena kṛtāni /
S04bsu016_u:12282: so imu bhadracariṃ bhaṇamānaḥ kṣipru parikṣayu neti aśeṣam // 51 //
S04bsu016_u:12283: jñānatu rūpatu lakṣaṇataśca varṇatu gotratu bhotirupetaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:12285: kṣipru sa gacchati bodhidrumendraṃ gatva niṣīdati sattvahitāya /
S04bsu016_u:12286: budhyati bodhi pravartayi cakraṃ dharṣati māru sasainyaku sarvam // 53 //
S04bsu016_u:12287: yo imu bhadracaripraṇidhānaṃ dhārayi vācayi deśayito vā /
S04bsu016_u:12288: buddha vijānati yo 'tra vipāko bodhi viśiṣṭa ma kāṅkṣa janetha // 54 //
S04bsu016_u:12289: mañjuśirī yatha jānati śūraḥ so ca samantatabhadra tathaiva /
S04bsu016_u:12290: teṣu ahaṃ anuśikṣayamāṇo nāmayamī kuśalaṃ imu sarvam // 55 //
S04bsu016_u:12292: tāya ahaṃ kuśalaṃ imu sarvaṃ nāmayamī varabhadracarīye // 56 //
S04bsu016_u:12293: kālakriyāṃ ca ahaṃ karamāṇo āvaraṇān vinivartiya sarvān /
S04bsu016_u:12294: saṃmukha paśyiya taṃ amitābhaṃ taṃ ca sukhāvatikṣetra vrajeyam // 57 //
S04bsu016_u:12296: tatra gatasya imi praṇidhānā āmukhi sarvi bhaveyyu samagrā /
S04bsu016_u:12297: tāṃśca ahaṃ paripūrya aśeṣān sattvahitaṃ kari yāvata loke // 58 //
S04bsu016_u:12298: tahi jinamaṇḍali śobhani ramye padmavare rucire upapannaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:12299: vyākaraṇaṃ ahu tatra labheyyā saṃmukhato abhitābhajinasya // 59 //
S04bsu016_u:12301: sattvahitāni bahūnyahu kuryāṃ dikṣu daśasvapi buddhibalena // 60 //
S04bsu016_u:12302: bhadracaripraṇidhāna paṭhitvā yatkuśalaṃ mayi saṃcitu kiṃcit /
S04bsu016_u:12303: ekakṣaṇena samṛdhyatu sarvaṃ tena jagasya śubhaṃ praṇidhānam // 61 //
S04bsu016_u:12310: te cāryasamantabhadrabodhisattvapramukhā yauvarājyābhiṣiktāḥ paramāṇurajaḥsamā mahābodhisattvā nānālokadhātusaṃnipatitāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:12313: sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavataḥ samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti //
S04bsu016_u:12315: ye dharmā hetuprabhāvā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tethāgato hyavadat /
S04bsu016_u:12316: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodho evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
